If you like games that are different or unique, set in different time periods, with unusual stories or new mechanics, then this might be a good game for you.  If you like super-hard platformers, this isn’t that type of game.

The average play time is roughly 4-5 hours, but it’s like most games based around puzzles – some of you will complete it faster or take longer to explore the world.  But, we encourage you not to race through it – to us, CONTRAST is a performance, where every minute we’re trying to bring you something different.  We suggest you find and read all the collectibles, if you’d like to fully understand the story (and to get the full sweet 1000 G).  And, if you like it, feel free to come say hi on Twitter!

Play one of the best cooking games! Take control of a highly polished, realistic kitchen equipped with all kinds of utensils and stands. Unlock and master over 60 recipes or use dozens of lifelike ingredients to cook everything you like. A simulator spiced up with a dash of real-life physics!

Your kitchen’s got all the gear a chef might need. Griddles, cookers, gas stands, ovens and tons of utensils like pots, pans, plates, knives, spatulas and blenders! On top of that there are over 120 ingredients available in the pantry: meat and fish, fruit and veggies, dairy products and various liquids. There’s also a full set of spices and herbs for adding that extra flavour!

Lifelike cooking experience! All the ingredients respond to your actions by changing temperature, appearance and taste. Every time you’re slicing potatoes, flipping steaks or boiling a soup, there are some real-life physics applied to it. Once you learn the cooking mechanics and start serving dishes, you’ll see yourself becoming a better chef with every new plate on the checkout.

Career mode is a culinary journey zero-to-hero style and your task is to gain fame for you and your restaurant. You’ll start from the basics and progressively unlock new more complex dishes and start serving more customers as your fame and experience grow. Once you master the recipes and workflow, you’ll be able to unlock various perks and skills.

However, if you’re not interested in playing by the rules, you’re going to love the Sandbox mode. Access all the recipes and ingredients and prepare whatever you like without any pressure. You don’t even have to cook anything! Game physics gives you unlimited opportunities. Throw knives like darts, set up cutting boards like dominoes, set the whole kitchen on fire, blow up the oven and save the day using a fire extinguisher!

Leaderboard Challenge. Ever wanted to prove that you are the best chef around? Well, now you can! Pick an order and take it to the kitchen. No distractions, just one simple goal – serve the best dish you can, as fast as you can. Based on this performance, the game will calculate your score and place you on a leaderboard (each recipe has its own). Become an expert at one dish or master them all!

It’s time to leave big-city life in Pokyo behind and start a new chapter of your life on Coral Island! 

Be who you want and create the idyllic farm of your dreams, where you’ll tend crops, nurture animals, and build a bond with the natural world around you. Help revitalize the nearby town and its surrounding coral reefs, and forge relationships with a vibrant community of more than 70 fellow people who call Coral Island home. 

Farm. Decorate. Craft. Explore. Relax. Your future—and the future of Coral Island—is what you make of it.

BUILD YOUR DREAM FARM
Transform your overrun land on Coral Island into a lush and lively dreamscape—you decide what to build, what crops to grow, and which animals you’d like to tend. 

WRITE YOUR OWN STORY
The story changes with each season, but life goes with the flow. Spend your days exploring, or build a life with someone special. Save the seas, brave the caves, or focus on your farm. It’s up to you!

BE YOURSELF
Choose from a wide variety of outfits, accessories, and physiques—you’ll find plenty of options to express yourself, find your style, and be whoever you want to be. 

BEFRIEND A DIVERSE CAST OF ISLANDERS
Get to know the 70+ characters from all walks of life who live on Coral Island. Converse with them, find out more about their interests, and try to impress them with just the right gift.

FIND THAT SPECIAL SOMEONE
Meet 25 singles who are ready to mingle! Build relationships, sweep them off their feet, and find the one—and when you’re ready, embark on a new chapter of your story together at the farm.

RESTORE AN ISLAND ONCE PARADISE
Make Coral Island a better place for everyone! Liven up the town with community projects, expand the local museum, and restore heritage sites. Increase the town's rank and your community will thrive!

CATCH OF THE DAY
Island living has a lot of perks, including being just a stone's throw away from fun activities like hunting for insects and catching fish.

DIVE THE OCEAN & MINE THE CAVERNS
Go diving to restore the coral reef, or mine precious gemstones in the cavern. Whatever you decide to do, you’ll find loot to hone your tools and upgrade the quality of your livestock and crops.

Rediscover Halloween in this imaginative RPG from Tim Schafer's Double Fine Productions.  Explore the monster-filled neighborhood of Auburn Pines, Autumn Haven Mall and Fall Valley Carnival. Collect magical costumes with super powers, unique weapons and special items as you hunt down quests.  Level-up your heroic warrior and battle the evil overlords in this epic adventure to save Halloween!  Sweet info at www. CostumeQuestGame.com

是時候提升自己的戰鬥力，在《Crackdown 3》那混亂和被破壞的開放世界沙盒中扮演超凡特工，阻止罪案滋生！您將可以深入探索新普羅維登斯，駕駛獨具一格的載具在街頭馳騁，或者利用自身的超能力，對抗整個無法無天的犯罪帝國！您可以進行單人戰役，或是和好友合作闖關，甚至在全新的多人模式「破壞區」中參加火拼，讓破壞成為您的終極武器。線上多人遊戲需先訂閱 Xbox Live 金會員 (另購)。

熟能生巧
• 升級超級特工光速移動、跳躍高樓、向敵人摔卡車的技能，保衛城市抵抗冷血的暴徒。

危機四伏的開放世界
• 可單兵作戰或進行合作模式組隊探索浩瀚的垂直世界，捉拿犯罪集團頭目，打倒邪惡犯罪集團。

大力剷除犯罪
• 完成任務引誘黑幫老大出巢、打擊犯罪、剷除罪大惡極的頭目。

全新多人遊戲「破壞區」 
• 《Crackdown  3》內含全新的「破壞區」，這是一個內含多元模式的爆破競賽，毀滅就是你對抗好友和敵軍的終極武器。

***使用 Xbox One 進行線上多人遊戲需有 Xbox Live 金會員 (另購)。一次只能在一部裝置上遊戲。Windows 10 版各遊戲的 PC 硬體需求不同。Xbox One X 更新後將有多項改進。請至 xbox.com/enhanced 查看遊戲資訊。遊戲將不定期更新。

Cricket 22 delivers the most robust, substantial game of cricket that fans have ever seen. Enjoy the full licensed Ashes contest – the pinnacle of the long-standing rivalry between Australia and England. In addition, contest Australia’s big-hitting Big Bash T20 competition, the hugely innovative The Hundred in England, the tropical party of the CPL in the Caribbean, and take to the international field of battle with fully-licensed teams from Australia, England, The West Indies, New Zealand and Ireland. 

And, in keeping with Big Ant’s commitment to equality and equal representation, both the Men’s and Women’s games have been replicated across all of Cricket 22.

Cricket 22 also features a bevy of new innovations, including:

- All-new bowling and fielding controls; whether it’s a feisty fast bouncer, or the satisfying “snap” as you hurl the ball from the infield for a precision run-out, Cricket 22 features refined, tight controls that enable you to play your best game of cricket.

- A deep, narrative-driven career mode; you are in control on and off the field. You manage your training and press conferences, deal with injuries, and decide your path towards international glory!

- It’s the most accessible cricket game yet; New to Cricket? Cricket 22 makes it easier to get into the game than ever before, with a completely overhauled series of tutorials and first-time user experience. Cricket 22 is the most detailed simulation of the sport that Big Ant has ever created, and thanks to these tutorials we’ll have you out there batting and bowling like a pro in no time.

- An all-new commentary team; Cricket 22 brings a star-studded commentary team, featuring Michael Atherton, Ian Healy, Mel Jones, Alison Mitchell and David Gower. Every shot will be called with greater depth and analysis than ever before, and for the first time ever in a sports game, there will be an all-women commentary team, further deepening the representation of women in the Cricket 22 experience.

- The best-looking cricket ever; Cricket 22 takes full advantage of the capabilities of the latest generation of hardware. Not only does the game load with blinding speed, getting you into the action more quickly than ever before, it also includes a full suite of visual updates, including incredible real-time ray tracing elements, providing the most visually realistic game of cricket ever seen.

您終於可以在遊戲主機上遊玩 Paradox Development Studio 所推出、屢獲殊榮的策略角色扮演遊戲《Crusader Kings III》，體驗中世紀統治者的一生！擔任中世紀貴族家族的領袖，透過世代相傳，逐步增加其權力和聲譽。統治者死去之後，會被一位能力或興趣截然不同的繼承人所取代，這迫使您必須調整自己的長期計劃。

化身為沙場老將，征服您的敵人，或扮演一個狡猾的秘密探詢者，利用陰謀和毒藥來推進您的目的，所有的一切都能在遊戲中達成。在這款現代經典遊戲中安排聯姻、捍衛信仰並建立新帝國，和您在主機上玩過的其他策略遊戲全然不同。

歷史

您能在囊括冰島到印度、北極圈到中非的廣闊地圖上，從眾多王朝的皇室或貴族家族中選擇其一。
帶領王朝經歷世代交替，鞏固每個新世代的政權與國力。取得新的領土和頭銜來鞏固您的地位。
當一個虔誠的國王，讓宗教的力量為您所用；或自行開創新的宗教派別，就此千古流芳或遺臭萬年。
藉由騎士、農民起義、朝聖、維京入侵等元素，體驗中世紀的各種戲劇性事件與盛大場面！


人物

在五種不同的生活方式中選擇一個，磨練您的軍事策略或王國管理技巧。
獲得能引導您人物行為的特性，不過小心別違背本性！抗拒真實自我所造成的壓力可能會衍生許多新問題！
為您的繼承者選擇合適的監護人，或親自訓練他們。不過若合法繼承人不適任怎麼辦？
暴虐成性的人物可能會建立起令人畏懼的名聲，讓您膽小的臣民恐懼服從。


戰爭

招募披甲戰士單位和英勇的騎士來擴展您的王室兵源。
研發新科技來增加王國的財富和軍力。
延攬傭兵和教團在大規模戰爭中協助您。
向擄獲的囚犯索要贖金或劫掠附近的王國來增加收入。



陰謀

利用您的情報頭子發掘意圖反抗您王朝和王權的陰謀。
招募特工來協助實行您的計畫，削弱或暗殺任何妨礙您獲取權力的人。
勾引其他人物來擄獲對方的心或取得政治權力。
收集資訊以進行勒索，或在您的計畫需要額外影響力時向他人討人情。

"Darkest Dungeon® is a challenging gothic roguelike turn-based RPG about the psychological stresses of adventuring.

Recruit, train, and lead a team of flawed heroes through twisted forests, forgotten warrens, ruined crypts, and beyond. You'll battle not only unimaginable foes, but stress, famine, disease, and the ever-encroaching dark. Uncover strange mysteries, and pit your heroes against an array of fearsome monsters with an innovative strategic turn-based combat system.

Can you stem the tide of eldritch horrors erupting across your family’s ancestral estate? Remember: nothing can be gained without loss.

Descend at your peril into this award-winning game.

Nominated for Grand Prize - Independent Game Festival 2016
“Darkest Dungeon is an incredible take on the classic dungeon crawl.”  - Game Informer
""Darkest Dungeon is a masterpiece of emergent storytelling."" - Pelit"

Originally released by LucasArts in 1993 as a sequel to Ron Gilbert’s ground breaking Maniac Mansion, Day of the Tentacle is a mind-bending, time travel, cartoon puzzle adventure game in which three unlikely friends work together to prevent an evil mutated purple tentacle from taking over the world!

Over twenty years later, Day of the Tentacle is back in a remastered edition that features all new hand-drawn, high resolution artwork, with remastered audio, music and sound effects.

Voice only available in English and German.

英語版　※日本語字幕には対応しておりません。

《DayZ》是一款硬核開放世界生存遊戲；其中只有一個規則：無論如何，堅持活下去。每個角落都潛藏著各種危機，想生存下去可沒那麼容易…

關鍵特色：

• 遊戲沒有紀錄點或存檔；如果你死了，你將失去一切，並且得從頭再來。

• 複雜而真實的生存機制，包含狩獵、手工製作、建造、保健和資源管理。

• 與其他玩家的互動通常難以預料，並且充滿情緒化因素，為遊戲玩法帶來無限的可能性。

• 超大的 230 平方公里地圖，各種美麗地形和地標均基於真實世界打造。

• 最多 60 名玩家同時用盡一切手段努力活下去。你可以交朋友，見人就殺，綁架陌生人並逼迫其屈服於你；或者，你也會因為一罐食物遭到背叛。任何事情都可能發生。

• 各種環境威脅將會考驗你的能力。例如：多變的天氣、黑夜中危險的野獸和狂暴的被感染者。

Dead Cells puts you in control of a failed alchemic experiment trying to figure out what's happening on a sprawling, ever-changing and seemingly cursed Island. Tough but fair combat, responsive controls, challenging foes, permadeath and of course, the emergency panic roll to get you out of trouble, make for a demanding, visceral and cathartic action game. 

Experience a Roguevania, mixing an interconnected world, branching paths and unlockable skills with the constant adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath.  No checkpoints. You either vanquish the final boss in one go, or you try again. However, you keep some of your progress for successive runs; new paths you’ve unlocked, access to new levels, mutations, abilities and weapons.

Speaking of weapons, Dead Cells features a plethora of ways to slay your enemies. A large variety of swords, bows and of course spells, but also whips, grenades and turrets, each one with its own unique twist. Plus, mutations and scrolls allow you to build and customize your character differently with each and every run.

At the end of the day though, it’s YOUR skills as a player that matter most! Roguelites are about constantly sharpening your skills, until what was an insurmountable obstacle becomes a walk in the park. Patience, you’ll get better!… eventually.


Features:

RogueVania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline pumping threat of permadeath.

2D Souls-lite Action: Tough but fair combat, the iconic dodge roll, more than 90 weapons and spells with unique gameplay… The unforgiving action wed to the absence of any kind of safety net makes for an adrenalin pumping ride each and every run. 

Nonlinear progression: Sewers, Ossuary or Ramparts? Once unlocked, special permanent abilities allow you to access new paths to reach your objective. Opt for the path that suits your current build, your play style, or just your mood.

Exploration: Secret rooms, hidden passages, charming landscapes. Take a moment to stroll the towers and breath in that fresh sea mist infused air...

在轟動全球的《絕命異次元》電玩遊戲續集中，工程師伊薩克．克拉克（Isaac Clarke）再度踏上另一段恐怖的驚悚之旅。在巨大太空城市「The Sprawl」內，這位恐怖外星感染病的唯一倖存者從昏迷中甦醒，卻發現迎接自己的是宛如災難的可怕新夢魘。不但得與惱人的失智症纏鬥，還受到政府的通緝獵殺，更得面對死去女友的陰魂不散，伊薩克必須不計代價拯救自己，設法在可怕的襲擊中取得優勢。手持肢解死靈變體（Necromorph）的各式工具，憑藉著油然而生的果決意志力，我們的工程師將為太空再掀恐怖高潮。                                                          2011年，夢魘再臨！

在《Dead Space Ignition》中完成第一次破解與儲存遊戲，即可啟用《絕命異次元2》解鎖物品。 在《Dead Space Ignition》中，您必須從 Sprawl 的初次 Necromorph 爆發事件中存活下來。  此遊戲結合了漫畫風格的呈現方式以及三個獨特的破解遊戲。  您可以獲得《絕命異次元2》的解鎖物品，包括一套專屬服裝。  您是否能在這些《絕命異次元2》的前傳事件中存活？

打卡上下班收取亡者靈魂的日子雖然過得單調，但對烏鴉來說是務實的工作。當你分配到的靈魂被偷走了，這工作就變得鮮活起來，你必須追捕鋌而走險的
小偷進入未受死亡眷顧的領域– 那裡的生物都活得比壽命長很多，充滿了貪婪與力量。

DEATHLOOP為次世代第一人稱射擊遊戲，由一手打造《Dishonored》系列榮獲大獎肯定的Arkane Lyon工作室推出。在DEATHLOOP裡，兩名勢不兩立的殺手被困在黑礁島上神祕的時間循環中，注定永遠都要重複過著同一天。玩家將扮演寇特，而逃脫的唯一機會就是在每天時間重置前刺殺8個關鍵目標。寇特必須在每次的循環中嘗試不同途徑、蒐集未知情報、尋找全新武器和能力，一步步抽絲剝繭掌握線索。打破循環，不惜一切代價。

如果一開始沒成功……那就死吧，再死一次。
每一次重新循環都是改變局勢、扭轉戰局的大好機會，善用藉由不斷嘗試獲得的寶貴經驗，視情況改變你的遊玩風格，或隱匿行蹤穿梭在各個關卡之間，或直接挑起戰鬥展開激烈槍戰。每次循環，你都將揭露新的祕密、蒐集到關於刺殺目標或黑礁島的新情報，並擴展你的武器庫。結合難以想像的強大力量，以及數不清的血腥武器，你可以用盡一切手段施展既壯觀又致命的攻擊。隨心所欲地選擇你的能力及武器，使盡全力在這場獵人與獵物的生死存亡之爭殺出一條血路，最終逃出生天。

單人模式、多人死鬥一次滿足
你是英雄還是惡棍？你將扮演寇特完成DEATHLOOP的主要故事，在黑礁島上解決所有目標，最終逃離循環重獲自由。整趟旅程中，你將遭到對手茱莉安娜獵殺，而她可以是由另一名玩家所操控的。相同地，如果你某天玩心大起，特別想捉弄人，你也可以化身新潮又有型的茱莉安娜，闖入其他玩家的單人模式中殺死寇特。是否要進行多人遊戲體驗完全取決於你，玩家也可以選擇待在自己的單人模式中和一個由AI控制的茱莉安娜一決高下。

黑礁島：似天堂亦如地獄
Arkane作品的特色就是極具美感的世界，以及多樣、新穎的遊玩方式。DEATHLOOP則呈現一種令人驚豔、靈感來自60年代的未來復古風格，同樣極具個性。黑礁島也許外表看來是一處優美的世外桃源，但對寇特而言卻是囚禁他的監獄，一個死亡毫無意義的墮落世界，甚至還是一群想俘虜他的反派的狂歡聖地。

支援 Xbox Play Anywhere：無需額外費用便可在 Xbox One 和 Windows 10 PC 上玩遊戲。

Deep Rock Galactic 是一款多人合作科幻型第一人稱射擊遊戲，設有了不起的矮人、100% 可破壞的環境、由程式生成的洞穴以及無數外星怪物群體。

Hoxxes IV 具有迄今發現的聚集度最高的珍貴礦物；但是，從生物到動物，這個星球上的一切都滿懷敵意。好在 Deep Rock Galactic 雇請了全宇宙最好的太空礦工：矮人！採礦和殺怪是矮人最愛的兩件事，對於在太空行走的驕傲矮人而言，結合了這兩者的 Hoxxes 無疑是最佳工作。

 *** 4 人合作 ***
小組攜手合作，挖掘、探索和斬荊披棘地闖過巨大的洞穴系統，這裡面到處都是致命敵人和珍貴資源。若想在銀河系中最危險的洞穴系統中生存下去，你將需要依靠隊友！

*** 4 種獨特職業 ***
挑選勝任工作的合適職業。擔任 Gunner 一路殺敵挺進，擔任 Scout 在前方探路並照亮洞穴，擔任 Driller 鑽穿堅硬的岩石，或是擔任 Engineer 建造防禦結構和炮塔來支援隊伍。

*** 完全可破壞的環境 ***
摧毀周圍的一切來實現目標。遊戲中沒有固定路線，因此你可以按自己的方式完成任務。直接向下鑽到目標，或建造錯綜複雜的路線網來探索周圍環境 — 由你選擇。但要謹慎行事，你一定不想在毫無準備的情況下遇到外星人！

*** 由程式生成的洞穴網絡 ***
探索由程式生成的洞穴系統網絡，對抗各種敵人，收集各色財寶。你總會有新的發現，不存在兩次相同的遊戲體驗。

*** 高科技道具和武器 ***
矮人知道完成任務需要帶上什麼。這意味著你可以使用最強大的武器和最先進的道具 — 噴火器、加特林機槍、可擕式平台發射器以及更多。

*** 照亮道路 ***
地下洞穴又黑又恐怖。若想照亮這些漆黑的洞穴，你將需要帶上自己的光源。

有關本遊戲最新進展以及如何提供回饋和報告問題的詳細資訊，請造訪 https://www.deeprockgalactic.com/

Descenders is extreme downhill freeriding for the modern era, with procedurally generated worlds, and where mistakes have real consequences. Will you lead your team to glory and become the next legendary Descender?

• Procedurally generated worlds: Take on different jumps, slopes and hillbombs every time you play
• Freestyle bike controls: Control every subtle movement of your rider, with an in-depth physics system made for slick whips and scrubs
• Risk vs reward: Push your rider for massive scores and combos -- but bail too many times and you might lose it all
• Build your Rep: A fully-featured online Rep system lets you show off your worth, and earn new bikes and threads
• Become the next Descender: Can you survive the game in a single run, and reach the ranks of the legendary Descenders?

Pick a Team, Become a Legend

In Descenders, your team is your life. When you pick a side -- Enemy, Arboreal or Kinetic -- you'll be bound together with other players who choose the same side as you.

Grab your bike, pick your team, and attempt to live up to the legend of your Descender. Will you join the die-hard, trick-frenzy ranks of Team Enemy, the proficient, off-road stylings of Team Arboreal, or the high-octane, speed-is-everything Team Kinetic?

• Wear your team's colors and apparel with pride, and receive exclusive team gear
• Your Rep points go towards your team's total Rep, and exclusive prizes are awarded to the top team
• Gain access to your team's exclusive channel on the Descenders Discord server

化身會走路的巨大骰子，
闖入不斷變化的地下城，
陷入殘酷且復雜的戰鬥。
當你是一枚骰子時，
又要如何與幸運女神為敵呢？

《骰子地下城》是由獨立遊戲制作人 Terry Cavanagh ，知名遊戲音樂人 Chipzel 和插畫師 Marlowe Dobbe 開發的快節奏卡牌構建式 Roguelike 遊戲。

關註獨立遊戲的玩家可能聽說過獨立遊戲制作人 Terry Cavanagh 之前的一些作品：例如以反轉重力為玩法的平臺解密遊戲 VVVVVV 和高難度節奏反應遊戲《超級六邊形》（Super Hexagon）。

Let Loose
Whilst respecting the heritage and retaining the DNA of the franchise, DIRT 5 writes a new chapter in the legacy of DIRT – bolder and braver than ever before. New features, new innovations and a fresh approach make DIRT 5 a hub of off-road racing, style and culture, where you can constantly create highlight-reel moments.

Blaze a Trail Across the Globe
Take a trip around the world to and race on over 70+ unique routes across 10 different global locations in stunning, dynamic environments. From racing on the frozen East River in New York, to under the Christ the Redeemer in Brazil, to shining by the Northern Lights at Norway, take on opponents, the terrain and extreme, everchanging conditions.

Push The Limits with Incredible Cars
Get behind the wheel of an eclectic and exciting roster of cars. Conquer the toughest of terrain with boulder-beating machines, take iconic rally cars to new locations, or feel the power of 900bhp sprint cars. Rallycross, GT, unlimited trucks, buggies and muscle cars complete the ultimate off-road garage.

Own the Spotlight in a Star-Studded Career
Under the tutelage of an icon, all eyes are on you to become the new star of an amplified world of off-road racing. Earn sponsorships and unique rewards, conquer all locations, and take on a fierce rival in our biggest ever Career.

Compete or Co-Operate in Off-Road Action
Local split-screen up to four players on offline modes, including Career, makes DIRT 5 the perfect couch multiplayer racing game as you battle for position with your friends. Online, throw down in curated race playlists for up to 12 players, and compete in innovative objective-based modes. 

Create, Share and Discover with Playgrounds
For the first time in a DIRT game, you can now create your own Gymkhana, Smash Attack and Time Attack challenges and share them online with friends and the DIRT community.

Game leverages Smart Delivery allowing access to both the Xbox One title on 3rd November and the Xbox Series X|S title on 10th November.

DiRT Rally 2.0 dares you to carve your way through a selection of iconic rally locations from across the globe, in the most powerful off-road vehicles ever made, knowing that the smallest mistake could end your stage

You will need to rely on your instincts with the most immersive and truly focused off-road experience yet, including a new authentic handling model, tyre choice and surface degragation. Power your rally car through real-life off-road environments in New Zealand, Argentina, Spain, Poland, Australia and the USA, with only your co-driver and instincts to guide you. 
Race on eight official circuits from the FIA World Rallycross championship, complete with licensed Supercars and support series.

Develop your team and cars around race strategies, and progress through a varied selection of Events and Championships in both a single player Career Campaign and a competitive online environment.

• OVER 50 OF THE MOST POWERFUL OFF-ROAD CARS EVER BUILT – Tear through environments with an iconic roster of historic and modern-day rally cars, VW Polo GTI R5, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution X & Citroen C3 R5. Also take on the challenging power of the Chevrolet Camaro GT4.R.

• 6 REAL LIFE RALLY LOCATIONS –Take the wheel through the stunning environments of New Zealand, Argentina, Spain, Poland, Australia and the USA.

• FEEL YOUR RACE – Improved handling, surfaces, fallibility and environments deliver the most authentic and focused off-road experience ever. 

• THE OFFICIAL GAME OF THE FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS CHAMPIONSHIP – Race at Barcelona, Montalegre, Mettet, Lohéac Bretagne, Trois-Rivieres, Hell, Holjes and Silverstone in a multitude of different series.

• DEVELOP YOUR OWN TEAM – Create a team, hire your staff and expand your garage of vehicles as you choose.
 
• TUNING – Tune your vehicle to suit your driving style and environmental characteristics. Alleviate wear and tear by configuring each car’s set-up, and upgrade your parts to ensure your vehicles are ready for whatever challenge lies ahead.

• GET COMPETITIVE – Race the entire DiRT Community in Daily, Weekly and Monthly Challenges, with worldwide leaderboards and events.

Reprise your role as a supernatural assassin in Dishonored 2.

Praised by IGN as “amazing” and “a superb sequel”, declared a “masterpiece”  by Eurogamer, and hailed “a must-play revenge tale among the best in its class” by Game Informer, Dishonored 2 is the follow up to Arkane Studio's first-person action blockbuster and winner of more than 100 'Game of the Year' awards, Dishonored. 

Play your way in a world where mysticism and industry collide. Will you choose to play as Empress Emily Kaldwin or the royal protector, Corvo Attano? Will you make your way through the game unseen, make full use of its brutal combat system, or use a blend of both? How will you combine your character's unique set of powers, weapons and gadgets to eliminate your enemies? The story responds to your choices, leading to intriguing outcomes, as you play through each of the game's hand-crafted missions.

https://bethesda.net/en/document/privacy-policy

Arkane Studios’ Dishonored®, winner of over 100 Game of the Year awards, and all of its additional content come to the next generation in Dishonored® Definitive Edition! With Dishonored’s flexible combat system, creatively eliminate your targets as you combine the supernatural abilities, weapons and unusual gadgets at your disposal. “Void Walker’s Arsenal” offers unique character bonuses, additional bone charm slots, and more that will aid you in pursuit of revenge. Enter the world of the Outsider in “Dunwall City Trials” where you will put your combat, stealth and mobility skills to the test. Finally, play as the legendary assassin Daud in "The Knife of Dunwall" and “The Brigmore Witches”.

https://bethesda.net/en/document/privacy-policy

Take on the role of Billie Lurk (aka Megan Foster), once one of Dunwall's most notorious killers-for-hire. Reunited with your old mentor, the legendary assassin Daud, you undertake the greatest assassination ever conceived: killing the Outsider, a god-like figure whom Billie and Daud see as instrumental to some of the Empire's most dishonorable moments. As you venture deep into the grimiest corners of Karnaca to uncover the mystery of the Outsider and his origins, you will face deadly opposition,  ancient powers, and difficult decisions that will forever change the world around you.

內含8,000顆月亮石*

《迪士尼夢幻星谷》是一款結合模擬和冒險的遊戲，擁有豐富的任務、引人入勝的活動，還有迪士尼和皮克斯的新面孔與熟面孔。

夢幻星谷曾是一片恬靜的夢幻之地，迪士尼和皮克斯的角色在這裡和睦相處...但「大遺忘」讓此地在一夕之間風雲變色。暗夜荊棘恣意生長，切斷了與這個神奇之地相連的美好回憶。夢幻星谷絕望的居民無處可去，只能躲進大門深鎖的夢幻城堡裡。

現在，將由你來探索這個世界的故事，把魔法帶回夢幻星谷！

探索夢幻星谷的秘密
將夢幻城堡從「大遺忘」的魔爪中解救出來，替迪士尼和皮克斯的熱門角色解鎖王國領地，當中包括安娜與辛巴等偉大的女王和國王。每個王國都包含獨特的挑戰，解開謎團並完成任務就能把友誼帶回星谷。
你將在星谷中展開冒險，但你的旅程將帶你飛向浩瀚無垠的世界！探索危機四伏的勇氣森林，勇敢走進最深的洞窟，迎接迪士尼和皮克斯經典英雄和反派的挑戰。星谷中處處皆是驚喜等你探索。

與迪士尼和皮克斯角色建立友誼
和瓦力一起當園藝高手，和小米一起做飯，或是和高飛一起悠哉地釣魚。與你的夥伴一起收集、製作物品，並讓星谷重返往日榮耀。從美麗的公主到邪惡的反派，每位夢幻星谷的居民都有屬於自己的故事線、任務和獎勵。和你最喜歡的迪士尼和皮克斯角色交朋友，每天聚在一起歡樂無窮。

讓星谷重現昔日的輝煌
解救星谷脫離「大遺忘」的掌控，親手打造夢幻星谷，讓它回歸昔日光榮。你可以發揮創意自訂格局，還有不同的景觀和數千件裝飾品，供你打造專屬於你的完美家園。
你想和莫娜一起住在海灘上，還是在廣場上和巴斯光年做鄰居呢？

展現你的迪士尼風采
展現你內心的公主風、反派風或任何迪士尼風！搭配獨特的服裝，用數千件精美物品裝飾你的家。你甚至可以使用「魔法之觸」工具，用迪士尼和皮克斯主題貼紙創造自己的設計！
使用遊戲中的相機來和米拉貝兒來個夕陽自拍，你也可拍下小米的烹飪傑作，或單純簡單記錄每一個珍貴時刻。

不斷推陳出新的遊戲
新內容意味著總有新鮮事物可以探索。你可以在星谷中結識新角色，或在史高治商店中查看最新的服裝和家具收藏，還可完成極具挑戰的遊戲賽事！三不五時就造訪夢幻星谷，探索新的冒險吧！

*「月亮石」是遊戲中的貨幣，可以透過在遊戲中完成任務免費獲得或是使用真實金錢購買。月亮石可用於解鎖「星路」的高級路徑（該系統之靈感來自於戰鬥通行證，當玩家完成各種任務和挑戰時，會獲得遊戲中的裝飾性物品）。月亮石也可用於加速星路進度。此外，月亮石還能用來購買遊戲商店中的裝飾性物品。

Now includes all three premium DLC packs (Unto the Evil, Hell Followed, and Bloodfall), maps, modes, and weapons, as well as all feature updates including Arcade Mode, Photo Mode, and the latest Update 6.66, which brings further multiplayer improvements as well as revamps multiplayer progression.

DOOM returns as a brutally fun and challenging modern-day shooter experience. Relentless demons, impossibly destructive guns, and fast, fluid movement provide the foundation for intense, first-person combat – whether you’re obliterating demon hordes through the depths of Hell in the single-player campaign, or competing against your friends in numerous multiplayer modes. Combine your arsenal of futuristic and iconic guns, upgrades, movement and an advanced melee system to knock-down, slash, stomp, crush, and blow apart demons in creative and violent ways. Expand your gameplay experience using the DOOM SnapMap game editor to easily create, play, and share your content with the world.

由id Software開發的《DOOM》，最初於1993年發行，不僅開創第一人稱射擊遊戲先河，也讓這類遊戲廣受歡迎，為所有第一人稱射擊遊戲立下標竿。強化版於2019年登陸PC、主機和行動裝置。現在，你可於Epic遊玩強化版主遊戲，以及其他內容。

劇情
你是地球上最強的特種戰士，最近被派赴到聯合航太公司（簡稱UAC）位於火星的研究中心。結果UAC連結火衛一和火衛二的傳送門發生故障，製造出邪氣沖天的地獄傳送門。火星基地慘遭惡魔蹂躪，你的戰士同伴紛紛陣亡，你必須火力全開，設法逃出生天。

特點
強化版讓玩家可以輕鬆在現代平台上享受初代遊戲，改善的內容包括：
- 視覺效果升級
- 改善鍵盤滑鼠控制
- 支援遊戲手把／控制器
- 支援寬螢幕解析度
- 支援原生60 FPS幀率
- *免費社群追加內容：超過10個追加內容，包括「Sigil」、「Rekkr」、「Syringe」、「Double Impact」、「Arrival」、「Revolution」以及更多
-〈Episode IV: Thy Flesh Consumed〉
- 本機分割畫面合作模式與PvP
- *使用Slayers Club帳戶登入可獲得《DOOM Eternal》的復古風靛藍色DOOM特種戰士造型與搭配的名牌。

*須有Bethesda.net帳號。如須查看《使用者授權協議》、《服務條款》、《隱私權政策》和其他詳細資料，請前往bethesda.net。

《DOOM 3》由id Software開發，最初於2004年發行，重新詮釋了初代《DOOM》，是一款備受讚譽的恐怖動作第一人稱射擊遊戲。為慶祝問世25週年，《DOOM》於2019年發行強化版，讓玩家可以輕鬆在現代平台上享受初代遊戲。

劇情
地獄大軍大舉入侵，聯合航太公司（簡稱UAC）的研究中心慘遭蹂躪，只留下一片狼藉與生靈塗炭。你是少數倖存者之一，必須殺入地獄屠盡惡魔大軍，然後活著回來。

特點
- 視覺效果升級
- 改善鍵盤滑鼠控制
- 支援遊戲手把／控制器
- 支援寬螢幕解析度
- 支援原生60 FPS幀率
-〈Resurrection of Evil〉與〈The Lost Missions〉資料片組合包
- *使用Slayers Club帳戶登入可獲得《DOOM Eternal》的復古風紅色DOOM特種戰士造型與搭配的名牌。

*須有Bethesda.net帳號。如須查看《使用者授權協議》、《服務條款》、《隱私權政策》和其他詳細資料，請前往bethesda.net

《DOOM 64》發行，歡慶《DOOM》系列滿25週年。

展開長征，對抗惡魔，尋找惡魔之母，並阻止地獄入侵。玩家必須挑戰超過30個驚險刺激的關卡，仔細尋找強大的武器與秘密，終結惡魔帶來的威脅。

地獄大軍已入侵地球。加入精彩刺激的單人戰役，化身毀滅戰士征服各次元的惡魔，阻止人類迎向最終滅絕。

唯一能嚇阻他們的……就是你。

《DOOM Eternal》完美結合速度與力量，將第一人稱戰鬥遊戲推展到全新的境界。

毀滅戰士威脅等級達到最高
裝備肩上式火焰噴射器、可收疊腕帶式刀刃、升級的槍枝與改造配件，還有各式技能，讓你動作更快、力量更強，戰鬥方式更靈活。

弒敵三絕招
需要什麼就從敵人身上拿，成為頂尖惡魔殺手：壯烈擊殺可以獲得額外生命值，用火燒可獲得護甲，用電鋸殺死惡魔則可以累積彈藥。

進入戰鬥模式
全新2對1多人遊戲體驗，由一名全副武裝的毀滅戰士對上兩隻由玩家操控的惡魔，在激烈的五戰三勝制第一人稱對戰中一較高下。

《DOOM II》是《DOOM》（1993）的續作，同樣是由id Software所開發，最初於1994年發行，是一款深受好評的第一人稱射擊遊戲。強化版於2019年登陸PC、主機和行動裝置。現在你可於同一處，暢玩強化版主遊戲和其他內容。

劇情
地獄大軍入侵地球，為了拯救地球免於滅亡，你必須用威力強大的武器來對抗這些高強的惡魔。這是《DOOM》（1993）開創了全新遊戲風潮後，深受大眾喜愛的續作，玩家可以使用兇殘的超級霰彈槍，對抗惡名昭彰的頭目「罪惡之像」，體驗更加刺激的第一人稱射擊遊戲。

特點
- 視覺效果升級
- 改善鍵盤滑鼠控制
- 支援遊戲手把／控制器
- 支援寬螢幕解析度
- 支援原生60 FPS幀率
- *免費社群追加內容：超過10個追加內容，包括「Sigil」、「Rekkr」、「Syringe」、「Double Impact」、「Arrival」、「Revolution」以及更多
- 可玩所有20個大師關卡
- 本機分割畫面多人合作模式與PvP
- *使用Slayers Club帳戶登入可獲得《DOOM Eternal》的復古風青銅DOOM特種戰士造型與搭配的名牌。

*須有Bethesda.net帳號。如須查看《使用者授權協議》、《服務條款》、《隱私權政策》和其他詳細資料，請前往bethesda.net

〈TNT: Evilution〉資料片
UAC將其實驗轉移至木星的其中一個衛星。一艘被物認為補給船的太空船獲准降落，但當它接近基地，大批惡魔傾巢而出。你所有同伴不是遭到屠殺就是變成殭屍。現在你要做的不是求生，而是復仇。

〈The Plutonia Experiment〉資料片
國家的頂尖科學家殫心竭慮，關閉了七道跨次元的地獄大門，但還有一道傳送門敞開。你必須獨自入侵被毀壞的基地，打倒守門的惡魔，偷走最後的地獄傳送門，以免不死軍團稱霸世界。

〈Additional Masters Levels〉
這個資料片原以〈Master Levels for DOOM II〉形式發布，內含20個額外關卡，每個關卡都跟主遊戲一樣，讓人充分感受到地獄的恐怖，以及刺激無比的動作場面。所有關卡皆由獨立設計師創作而成，並由id Software監督。

developerName: Un Je Ne Sais Quoi, Umanimation
productDescription:
親身感受獨特的敘事體驗，踏上充滿活潑生氣的旅程，它將喚醒你的感官，找回溫暖的回憶。

扮演小蜜，探尋童年的珍貴往事，和與已故祖母共度的溫馨時光。當過去與現在相遇，帶著深刻的童年回憶勇敢面對你長大成人後的抉擇，揭開失落已久的家族秘密。

在瑰麗的手繪水彩環境中，探索多爾多涅萬紫千紅般的夏日景致。在冒險中找回記憶中的重要時刻與遼闊的景色、香氣、聲音與感官。在日記中細數這些生動的回憶，成為小蜜家人的往事；這是你獨有的體驗也是一段懷舊、感人的旅程反思。

•	探索手繪水彩畫成的多爾多涅的壯麗景色
•	展開獨特、溫暖人心的敘事體驗
•	於探索童年回憶之際，喚醒你的感官
•	收集照片、聲音與香氣，用它們創作你的日記，讓你的冒險顯得獨一無二

From the makers of Mass Effect comes the dark fantasy epic: You are a Grey Warden, one of the last of a legendary order of guardians. With the return of mankind's ancient foe and the kingdom engulfed in civil war, you have been chosen by fate to unite the shattered lands and slay the archdemon once and for all. (1) Immerse yourself in a shattered world on the brink of annihilation; (2) Experience complex moral decisions that have game-changing consequences; (3) Sculpt your hero in your own image or fantasy; (4) Engage in bone-crushing, visceral combat against massive and terrifying creatures

由備受好評的《闇龍紀元：序章》和《質量效應 2》製作團隊所打造，2009 年度最佳遊戲的史詩級續作等著您體驗。家鄉慘遭摧毀，而您是少數逃出生天的幸運兒之一。您被迫在瞬息萬變的世界中為生存而戰，必須召集最強勢的盟友、積攢名利，並在史冊中佔據一席之地。見證世界一夕之間風雲變色的故事。屬於你的「權力之爭」（Rise to Power）傳奇即刻展開。  

主要特色：
• 啟程展開橫跨十年的全新冒險，您所做出的每個抉擇將會決定故事走向。
• 從一貧如洗的難民，晉升為領地上受人尊敬的勇士。您將決定如何在權力之爭中脫穎而出。
• 無論您是一名法師、盜賊或戰士，皆能透過生動的全新戰鬥機制來體驗戰鬥臨場感，像將軍般運籌帷幄，像斯巴達戰士般奮戰不懈。
• 宛如電影般的全新劇情體驗，帶您身歷其境地沉浸於《闇龍紀元》的世界。
• 由令人驚豔的細節、升級的畫質，和嶄新視覺風格所建構的全新領域正等著您探索。

Control the spice, control the universe.

This is your desert, your Dune.

Lead your faction and battle for control and dominance over the harsh desert planet of Arrakis. Spice is the most valuable resource in the universe. The spice extends life, expands consciousness, and makes interstellar travel possible. Found only on Arrakis, it is sought by the most influential forces in the Imperium…

Scan the landscape for wormsign or risk losing your troops and spice harvesters to colossal sandworms who will burst through the dunes to devour them whole. Crush your opponents in combat, best them through political intrigue, and undermine them with your network of illusive spies.


Frank Herbert's Dune.

Experience the unique Dune universe, one of the most influential sci-fi settings ever created. Lead your faction to victory with iconic characters, such as Duke Leto Atreides, the Baron Vladimir Harkonnen, the Padishah Emperor Shaddam IV, Esmar Tuek, and Liet Kynes. Stay alert as opposing factions seek to gain the upper hand and the planet itself threatens with vast deserts, huge storms, and the dreaded sandworms.


Forge your own path to victory.

4X in real time.

Balance open warfare, subterfuge, political influence, and economic supremacy to prevail and gain control over the most important planet in the universe. Use secretive agents to sabotage the plans of your opponents. Vote on political resolutions in the Landsraad to further your strategy. Or dominate your opponents by overwhelming them with an all out assault.

Explore Arrakis with ornithopters to discover resources, villages, and points of interest. Expand with your troops to take control of regions. Exploit the resources through buildings and spice harvesters to dominate the economy. Deploy your spaceships and aircrafts to exterminate your enemies but beware as outright aggression can have high political repercussions.


Choose your faction.

Embark on a strategic journey where you can choose the path of honor and politics or embrace violence and deceit. Choose from various factions with unique abilities and playstyles. Each faction can be customized by selecting councilors who enhance their strengths and mitigate weaknesses.

Whether you choose survival tactics, shady dealings, military might, or dominating the spice trade, there is a faction and councilor combination for every player's preference. Explore the possibilities and shape your own destiny on Arrakis.


The conquest of Arrakis. 

Conquest mode.

Take control of one of the major houses and fight through a number of unique scenarios and situations. Personalize your starting house with a variety of perks and upgrades to tackle the many challenging objectives of the Conquest mode, ensuring you a unique experience every time you play.


Up to 4-player multiplayer.

Band together in 2v2 matches or face each other in a free-for-all of up to four players. Tailor the parameters of your multiplayer match to your preferences, including AI difficulty, map size, victory conditions, sandworm aggression, storms, and number of Sietches. Team up and try different faction combinations to identify synergies and dominate Arrakis.

邪惡至尊和它值得信賴的（咳咳）僕人黑暗精靈達莉婭在史詩般的前作遊戲中又一次戰勝了正義的一方，並將在《地下城4》中回歸。

建造一個溫暖舒適的地下城以滿足你手下的需求並統治它們，然後將它們送到地表世界，從而善意地提醒生活在那裡的善良民眾：他們生活的土地由邪惡至尊統治。 你將以全新且充滿活力的方式獲得邪惡值，並且將其釋放到地表世界鬱鬱蔥蔥的綠色森林和平原上，將它們轉變為黑暗之地。 但是請務必用陷阱布下防守，確保你的地下城堅不可摧，並且派出你的手下去守衛它。 因為當你把地表人的土地變成邪惡至尊最心儀的度假天堂時，那些討厭的傢伙可不會輕易讓你成功。 

但那是什麼噪音？ “金幣，金幣，金幣和寶石，金幣和寶石還有金幣！ “伴隨著鐵鎚和斧頭叮當作響的聲音，古老的歌聲響徹地下世界。 矮人也要來分一份這豐富的資源，而且他們要和地表世界的精靈、人類一起，派遣掠奪小隊尋找地下城的中心。

《地下城4》延續了前作的靈魂，但所有元素都更加龐大、更加優秀，並且還帶來了更加動態化的邪惡值。

• 矮人讓一切變得更好：矮人來到這裡建造他們的地下要塞，而這群頑強的小傢伙（雖然他們不喜歡被這樣稱呼）將與不斷擴張的邪惡爭奪空間和資源。

• 讓地下城再次偉大：地下城的規模是以前的四倍，而且手下的種類更多了，它們等待著萬能邪惡下達命令去征服地表世界。 現在是時候擁有龐大的軍隊和真正龐大的地下城了！

• 收穫的時機成熟了：地表世界比以往任何時候都要龐大。 擊敗癡迷於和諧的獨角獸等小型頭目獲得邪惡值，並利用它將地表世界變成令人驚歎的純粹邪惡生物群落。 

• 煥然一新：邪惡至尊值得信任的（咳咳）和最忠誠的下屬達莉婭，她基於能力的被動技能系統賦予了她令人印象深刻的新力量。 邪惡至尊現在可以通過可定製的邪惡之手享受接管世界、統治手下和抽下屬耳光的樂趣。

• 所到之處一呼百應：部落、亡靈和惡魔等待著邪惡至尊的命令，現在會熱切地聽從邪惡至尊手勢的手下比以往任何時候都要多，而這次鼻涕精將扮演更加突出的角色。

• 多種劇情敘述方式：這場漫長的戰役由前作中深受大家喜愛的英語旁白講述，同時還有多個場景都在挑戰你作為邪惡至尊的權威。

• 改變世界：將你的邪惡傳播到整個地表世界，將鬱鬱蔥蔥的環境變成黑暗之地，現在當你將邪惡傳播到許多新的生物群落時，你會閃耀出更有活力、更加迷人的邪惡光輝。

• 一起工作，一起殺戮：兩名玩家的多人合作模式，可由兩名玩家共同管理一個地下城。 所有來自場景和戰役的地圖都可以在合作模式下游玩。

《EA SPORTS™ UFC® 3》透過真實選手動作科技徹底改革擬真格鬥賽裡的招式動作，這項全新動畫科技可打造出運動遊戲裡反應最靈敏且逼真的運動動作。 最尖端的動作捕捉科技能補捉並重建每一次的出拳、踢擊、格擋和反擊，讓玩家看見並感受到逼真且靈敏的動作，締造更具競爭性的格鬥體驗。 在 G.O.A.T. 職業生涯模式中，玩家必須建立比賽宣傳值以獲得粉絲、賺取現金以在體育館訓練，並與其他格鬥家激烈打鬥來吸引世界的目光。 您在八角鐵籠外的世界所做的宣傳，和您在鐵籠內的格鬥表現一樣重要，您也將在這過程中一步步成長，拿下「史上最強」的封號。 此外，全新的可自訂多人模式系列打造快速、有趣、激烈且容易上手的比賽，讓您與好友進入八角鐵籠一決高下。在鐵籠中，您與對手隨時可能在下一擊做出可作為精采集錦的擊倒動作，勝負就在一眨眼間誕生。

*需遵守適用細則與限制。 詳情請見 HTTPS://WWW.EA.COM/LEGAL。

FIFA Women’s World Cup Australia and New Zealand 2023™ 將於 6 月 27 日推出，玩家可在 EA SPORTS™《FIFA 23》中體驗女子國際足球的巔峰，無需額外費用*。穿上你國家的球衣，享受最新版 EA SPORTS™ FIFA Women’s World Cup™ 最沉浸的體驗吧！遊戲中包含 32 支有資格參賽的國家、自訂球場裝飾、戲劇效果、比賽畫面、專屬球評，以及當然少不了的真實獎杯，讓你在比賽完畢時高舉慶祝。

EA SPORTS™《FIFA 23》將這項世界級賽事推向球場，遊戲也包含了男子組、女子組 FIFA World Cup™ 錦標賽事，這是有史以來第一次新增了女子俱樂部球隊，也有可以更輕鬆地與好友**對戰的跨平台遊玩比賽功能，以及在 Xbox One 上遊玩最愛模式的新方式。
無論你遊玩哪個模式，都可以透過 19,000 名以上的球員、700 支以上的球隊、100 座以上的球場，以及 30 個以上的聯賽（包括 UEFA Champions League、英格蘭超級足球聯賽、全新的英格蘭足總女子超級聯賽和法國甲組女子足球聯賽）來體驗這一項世界級的足球賽事，《FIFA 23》的真實性無與倫比。

此遊戲包含可選的遊戲內虛擬點數購買，可用於獲取遊戲內虛擬物品，包括隨機選擇的虛擬遊戲內物品。

適用條款與限制。詳細資訊請參閱 https://www.ea.com/games/fifa/fifa-23/game-offer-and-disclaimers。
*需要《EA Sports™ FIFA 23》（另售）、所有遊戲更新、網際網路連線及 EA 帳號。
**在相同世代平台上，可在某特定模式中啟用跨平台遊玩功能。深入了解跨平台遊玩功能：https://www.ea.com/games/fifa/fifa-23/news/pitch-notes-fifa-23-cross-play-deep-dive。

productTitle: EA SPORTS™《FIFA 23》標準版 Xbox Series X|S
productDescription:
FIFA Women’s World Cup Australia and New Zealand 2023™ 將於 6 月 27 日推出，玩家可在 EA SPORTS™《FIFA 23》中體驗女子國際足球的巔峰，無需額外費用*。穿上你國家的球衣，享受最新版 EA SPORTS™ FIFA Women’s World Cup™ 最沉浸的體驗吧！遊戲中包含 32 支有資格參賽的國家、自訂球場裝飾、戲劇效果、比賽畫面、專屬球評，以及當然少不了的真實獎杯，讓你在比賽完畢時高舉慶祝。

《FIFA 23》將更多真實足球的動作帶到世界級賽事的球場上，加上 Xbox Series X|S 中 HyperMotion2 技術的進化，其技術的精髓在於能夠捕捉兩倍真實世界的動作，有助於創造比以往都更加真實的足球動畫。以女子俱樂部球隊的身分參與比賽，這也是有史以來的第一次，你也可以體驗跨界比賽的功能，更容易與好友一起比賽**。
無論你遊玩哪個模式，都可以透過 19,000 名以上的球員、700 支以上的球隊、100 座以上的球場，以及 30 個以上的聯賽（包括 UEFA Champions League、英格蘭超級足球聯賽、全新的英格蘭足總女子超級聯賽和法國甲組女子足球聯賽）來體驗這一項世界級的足球賽事，《FIFA 23》的真實性無與倫比。

此遊戲包含可選的遊戲內虛擬點數購買，可用於獲取遊戲內虛擬物品，包括隨機選擇的虛擬遊戲內物品。

適用條款與限制。詳細資訊請參閱 https://www.ea.com/games/fifa/fifa-23/game-offer-and-disclaimers。
