* Improve your skills over time. As you make your way from a struggling greenhorn to a master farmer, you’ll level up in 5 different areas: farming, mining, combat, fishing, and foraging. As you progress, you’ll learn new cooking and crafting recipes, unlock new areas to explore, and customize your skills by choosing from a variety of professions.

* Become part of the local community. With over 30 unique characters living in Stardew Valley, you won’t have a problem finding new friends! Each person has their own daily schedule, birthday, unique mini-cutscenes, and new things to say throughout the week and year. Take part in seasonal festivals such as the luau, haunted maze, and feast of the winter star.

* Explore a vast, mysterious cave. As you travel deeper underground, you’ll encounter new and dangerous monsters, powerful weapons, new environments, valuable gemstones, raw materials for crafting and upgrading tools, and mysteries to be uncovered.

* Help restore Stardew Valley to it’s former glory by repairing the old community center, or take the alternate route and join forces with Joja Corporation.

* Court and marry a partner to share your life on the farm with. There are 10 available bachelors and bachelorettes to woo, each with unique character progression cutscenes. Once married, your partner will live on the farm with you. Who knows, maybe you’ll have kids and start a family?

* Spend a relaxing afternoon at one of the local fishing spots. Craft bait, bobbers, and crab pots to help you in your journey toward catching every fish and becoming a local legend!

* Donate artifacts and minerals to the local museum.

* Cook delicious meals and craft useful items to help you out. With over 100 cooking and crafting recipes, you’ll have a wide variety of items to create. Craft useful objects like scarecrows, oil makers, furnaces, or even the rare and expensive crystalarium!

《Starfield》出自打造過《The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim》及《Fallout 4》的獲獎製作團隊Bethesda Game Studios之手，是本團隊睽違超過25年來所打造的第一個全新宇宙。在這款以浩瀚星際為舞台的次世代角色扮演遊戲中，你可以創造任何你想要的角色，以前所未有的自由度盡情探索宇宙，為解開人類最大的祕密展開波瀾壯闊的旅程。

2330年，人類已跨出我們所在的太陽系，定居於新的星球，太空旅行已成為人類的日常。你將加入群星團這個末代太空探險家團體，穿梭於銀河各地尋找稀有的文物，在Bethesda Game Studios規模最浩大也最具野心的遊戲中，探索廣袤無垠的宇宙。

The dead have risen and civilization has fallen. Not even the military could stop the zombies, and now it's up to you to gather survivors, scavenge for resources and build a community with up to three of your friends in a post-apocalyptic world – a world where every decision matters, and where you define what it means to survive in this ultimate zombie survival simulation.

State of Decay 2: Juggernaut Edition re-imagines the popular survival game as a brand-new experience to welcome first-time players... and those who've come back from the dead. This edition is packed with new and remastered content for the ultimate zombie survival experience.

Join over 10 million existing players and discover what Juggernaut Edition has to offer:

• The base game plus all three add-on packs released to date, including the all-new Homecoming update:
     o Homecoming: a full-size, fully remastered, open world version of Trumbull Valley for the core game, reintegrating the Mount Tanner and Fairfield regions to the map, and adding new sites to scavenge, along with new sights to behold.
     o Heartland: an massive story campaign set in a familiar town with new challenges
     o Daybreak Pack: a test of teamwork with siege-style, "survive the horde" gameplay
     o Independence Pack: a celebration of history that blows up zombies... with fireworks!
• Remastered graphics and an upgraded engine featuring realistic fog effects
• An expanded soundtrack with hours of new thematic musical arrangements
• Providence Ridge: a brand-new open-world map full of forests, zombies, and mystery
• Two-handed heavy weapons with new melee combat moves to bust zombie heads
• A new introductory experience and improved controls to help you master the apocalypse

... and countless other improvements to the classic open-ended sandbox gameplay.

State of Decay: Year-One brings the hit zombie survival-fantasy franchise to Xbox One.  Delivered in beautifully remastered 1080p, along with improved lighting, textures, animations, and combat mechanics, State of Decay: Year-One pulls you even deeper into the post-outbreak world.  Make your stand against the collapse of society in the ultimate zombie survival-fantasy game. Explore an open world full of dangers and opportunities that respond to your every decision. Recruit a community of playable survivors, each with their own unique skills and talents. Design and fortify your base against the relentless hordes of the undead. Perform daring raids for food and ammunition, and do whatever it takes to live another day.

開拓家園
 最後的土地爭奪開始了！阿斯特里德，這顆星球正在凋零，要麼挖掘，要麼死亡！
 
 我們鎮下的礦坑現在空無一物。你知道嗎？有謠言說下面藏有古老的技術，可能有助於我們解決面臨的困境。趕緊召集大家，嚴陣以待，一起開始築造我們新的家園！在地面收集資源，在地下尋找礦石，這樣我們就可以吸引富有的機器人幫忙，讓我們能建得更宏偉，然後快速撤離這地方！
 
 領地管理
 隨著你的領土拓展，新的蒸汽機器人會陸續前來！每一位機器人都有自己的脾性，你得確保他們都維持高效運作。透過以物易物來提高效率，好讓礦坑的物資順利進出，保持每個人的工作滿意度，讓他們都全力以赴、盡力而為。
 
 向深處探索
 長久凝視深淵，深淵也會回望你……我們在追尋財富，但深處有東西並不願與我們分享！手持武器，挖掘碎石，當你提防那些潛伏在礦坑裡的怪物時，也要小心礦坑不會突然坍塌在你身上。。。特色：

• 在靈感來自於傳統的西部風情的熱鬧SteamWorld小鎮上開墾土地
• 確保滿足蒸汽機器人的各種需求，否則他們不會給你好臉色
• 深度挖掘和廣泛開發來生產資源，協助你尋找古老科技
• 防衛好你的礦井，別讓潛藏在小鎮地底的可怕生物侵門踏戶
• 在當地火車站進行資源交易，並且熱烈歡迎那些願意伸出援手的特殊訪客
• 提供五張布滿祕密的獨特地圖，等著精於探索的SteamWorld玩家去發掘
• 提供四個難度等級，包括一個你只想專注於建造的沙盒模式！

The universe is getting bigger every day! Paradox Development Studio is bringing the grand strategy genre to consoles for the first time ever with Stellaris: Console Edition. Featuring the same deep strategic gameplay, rich and diverse alien races and emergent storytelling, Stellaris: Console Edition puts the complexity of the galaxy at your thumbsticks. Whether you’re exploring the unknown, discovering the mysteries of the universe, or conquering it for the glory of your empire, console players have more inter-galactic strategy awaiting them than ever before.

The universe has arrived at your consoles, it’s up to you what to do with it.

MAIN FEATURES

- Behold the enormity of space with procedurally generated galaxies with an untold number of planets to explore.
- Encounter a myriad of wild, wacky, and dangerous alien races who may prove to be crucial trade partners or conquering forces hellbent on enslaving your civilization.
- Take on strategic space warfare and resource management to ensure the survival and advancement of your empire.
- Explore scientific anomalies and uncover technological wonders throughout the galaxy to mercilessly utilize them toward your own gains.
- Govern your own fledgling population and secure your power and agenda through manipulating internal policies, factions, traditions and more.

Now Available with co-op multiplayer!

TEST YOUR SURVIVAL SKILLS IN THIS OPEN WORLD ADVENTURE
In the aftermath of a mysterious plane crash, you are stranded in the vast expanse of the Pacific Ocean. Alone, or with a friend, without any means to call for help, you must do what you can to survive. 

BUILD. CRAFT. SURVIVE. ESCAPE.
Explore underwater and on land as you hunt for supplies to craft the tools, weapons, and shelter you’ll need to stay alive. Stay sharp: hunger, thirst, and exposure conspire against you as you brave treacherous elements and the dangerous creatures of the Pacific. 
Live long enough, Stay Alive!

Don’t miss the game that IGN awarded Best Xbox One Game of 2014, the game that Polygon rated 9 out of 10, and the game that Eurogamer calls “a breath of fresh air.”  In Sunset Overdrive, the year is 2027 and Sunset City is under siege. A contaminated energy drink has transformed most of the population into toxic mutants. For many it's the end of the world, but for you it’s a dream come true. Your old boss? Dead. Your boring job? Gone. Transform the open-world into your tactical playground by grinding, vaulting and wall-running across the city while using a devastating, unconventional arsenal. With hyper-agility, unique weapons, and customizable special abilities, Sunset Overdrive rewrites the rules of traditional shooters and delivers an explosive, irreverent, stylish, and totally unique adventure exclusively to Xbox One.

The downloadable version of this game supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese.

歡迎來冒險！

《Super Lucky’s Tale》是一款老少咸宜的歡樂遊樂場平台遊戲。主角「樂奇」是一個天性樂觀、精力充沛、令人愛戴的英雄，他的任務是找到自己的內在力量，幫助姊姊將時空之書從金克斯手中奪回來。金克斯是一個奸詐又神秘的壞蛋，試圖重新塑造世界，但他的目的是什麼呢？

在冒險過程中，您將會遇到爆笑的配角朋友和對手們。樂奇必須對抗金克斯調皮搗蛋的孩子們：邪惡的惡貓幫，他們是一群無師自通的小壞蛋，偶而會搞砸金克斯的計畫。樂奇在路上也會遇到朋友和戰友，像是跑錯地方的雪怪、古靈精怪的小幽靈們、一群農田蟲蟲和其他居住在時空之書裡有趣的朋友們。
 
在各種謎題和讓人傷腦筋的障礙賽中測試您的技巧。用樂奇招牌的挖掘動作來探索新世界不為人知的祕密。跳進不可預知的狐狸洞中或嘗試捲動挑戰關卡來解除額外獎勵的鎖定。
 
重溫經典平台遊戲的樂趣，各年齡層和各種等級的玩家都能輕鬆上手。

Super Mega Baseball 3 refines the series’ formula with the deepest on-field simulation yet, comprehensive offline and online play including Franchise mode and the newly added Online Leagues mode, and vastly improved graphics. New content includes revamped UI plus tons of new audio, team/character content, and stadiums with variable lighting conditions.

Features:
•	Challenge your hand-eye coordination or relax and hit dingers with fluid gameplay that scales seamlessly from novice to beyond-expert levels of difficulty.
•	Apply and refine your baseball instincts with a sophisticated baseball simulation featuring new pickoff and stealing mechanics, wild pitches/passed balls, designated hitters, and situational player traits.
•	Take in the sights and sounds of 14 richly detailed ballparks, each featuring unique day, night and alternate lighting conditions.
•	Guide an evolving team to greatness over multiple seasons in the all new Franchise mode featuring player development, aging, retirement and signing/releasing of free agents (1vCPU, 2vCPU, local or online).
•	Organize a cross-platform league with your friends in the newly added, versatile Online Leagues mode (1v1, online only).
•	Compete online to win pennants and climb to higher divisions in the cross-platform Pennant Race mode (1v1, online only).
•	Create your ideal league with a comprehensive customization suite that includes season length/structure, team names/uniforms/logos, and player names/appearance/attributes.
•	Play or simulate any combination of games/teams in customized Seasons and Elimination brackets, solo or with friends (1vCPU, 2vCPU, 1v1, 2v1, 2v2, CPUvCPU, local or online).
•	Skip customization and compete for top leaderboard scores with standardized teams and settings (locked player attributes) in Standard Season and Standard Elimination modes (1vCPU, 2vCPU, local or online).

Download the free trial to play an unlimited number of games in the competitive online Pennant Race mode, play Exhibition games against the AI, or experiment with the customization suite.

CONDITIONS AND RESTRICTIONS APPLY. SEE WWW.EA.COM/LEGAL FOR DETAILS.

在淩晨3點墜入夢鄉。你閉上雙眼，聽著皮爾斯醫生絮叨著自己的夢塑療程。醒來時，你發現自己置身於陌生的奇特場所，這時才發現，原來自己困在了夢境裡。在這裡，視角即現實。歡迎來到Superliminal的世界。

Superliminal是一款第一視角解密遊戲，靈感源自視角與光學幻象。玩家需要擁有見怪不怪的奇思異想才能解開謎題。

遊戲包括靜謐而離奇的環境、引人入“睡”的旁白以及各種不可思議的物體。

深入發掘最廣大的小小冒險

挖掘《Six Inches Under》地表之下的世界，這是一款全新第一人稱《Supraland》冒險，充滿解謎、探索、待探索的有趣祕密、數百個小故事，其中兩個特別有意思！

在這個迷你世界中，可怕的 Rakening 將 Supraland 的居民驅散到沙坑之下六英吋的地方！扮演英勇的藍衣水管工，實現你的玩具箱幻想，運用你的技能與創意求生並拯救你的同伴。你或許體型嬌小，但這註定是一場大冒險。

地底世界探索
挖掘一個彼此連通的玩具地下世界，這些玩具是過去災難的倖存者。這些洞穴裡充滿各種祕密等著你去發掘，等你拿到正確的工具與技能後，還能進入並探索新區域。

第一人稱解謎
用大腦解決環境中遇到的各種問題（偶爾也用蠻力）。熟練地利用平台尋找祕密並抵達難以到達的區域，並運用物理的力量找出創意方式來克服各種障礙。

這是個小小世界
對 Supraland 的人來說，小東西也能產生大影響。將火柴棒變成開門的槓桿或點燃障礙物的火把。用最新的 AAA 電池技術為強大的機器提供動力，跨過堪稱裂隙大小的隙縫，並走在剃刀的刀鋒上（真的就是字面上描述的那樣！）。

值得深入探索的好地方
《Six Inches Under》是一款內容豐富的《Supraland》獨立衍生作（並不是續作），適合所有玩家遊玩！即使沒玩過原作也能直接深入探索遊戲。

更多受人喜愛的《Supraland》
如果你曾玩過原作的《Supraland》你會發現更多解謎、更多你喜愛的類銀河戰士惡魔城風格的探索；再加上更多技能、新穎的戰鬥方式、更多選擇性活動以及全新原創配樂。

此遊戲仍在開發中。可能無法隨著時間變更或發售為最終產品。購買前請確認您瞭解遊戲的未完成狀態。

《Techtonica》是一款第一人稱工廠建設遊戲，背景設定在一顆地外行星的地表之下。 玩家可以獨自或與好友一起建造工廠、收集資源、研究新技術、隨心所欲塑造地形並建立行動基地，最終揭開被遺忘已久的秘密。

有關遊戲最新狀況、如何提供意見回饋及回報問題的詳細資料，請參閱 https://techtonicagame.com。

productTitle: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge
productDescription:
半殼的英雄人物

《Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge》具有開創性的遊戲玩法，深植於永恆經典的格鬥機制，由清版動作遊戲專家 Dotemu（《Streets of Rage 4》開發者）及 Tribute Games 向各位呈現這款遊戲。在驚豔動人的像素藝術環境中大展身手，並與你最喜愛的忍者龜角色痛宰大量的可惡敵人，每名忍者龜角色各個具有自己的技能及招式——使得每次任務獨具特色！選擇一名鬥士、使用基本連擊招式擊敗對手，並體驗充滿令人驚嘆的動作及猛烈忍者技能的激烈戰鬥。獨自對抗許瑞德及其忠誠的腳族手下之際保持敏銳特質，或與最好的朋友至多同時 6 名玩家一同並肩作戰！

忍者龜不會對克朗網開一面

比巴與洛克史迪攻擊第 6 電視台，並偷走超級可怕的裝置以支援克朗及許瑞德的最新邪惡計畫之際，在《Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge》這款遊戲中，各個忍者龜角色會在經典的《TMNT》地點打擊犯罪、伸張正義。從曼哈頓及康尼島，一路到城市屋頂及濕冷的下水道，快來幫助這四個駭人的忍者龜痛宰腳族士兵、犀牛戰士及岩石部隊，一直到 X 次元！ 

忍者龜力量！！

盡享色彩驚豔的像素藝術圖像及復古的《TMNT》氛圍，絕對能讓你重溫超讚的 80 年代。每個角色、車輛、武器、物品及背景的靈感皆直接取自 1987 年的電視節目，讓你感覺像是跳進了電視之中一樣——結合了超酷的殺手幽默及精彩刺激的冒險旅程！ 

真的超讚的啦！

All Chapters FREE in June!
Tell Me Why is the latest narrative adventure game from DONTNOD Entertainment, the studio behind the beloved franchise, Life is Strange. In this intimate mystery, reunited twins Tyler and Alyson Ronan use their supernatural bond to unravel the memories of their loving but troubled childhood. Set in beautiful small-town Alaska, Tell Me Why features true-to-life characters, mature themes and gripping choices.
As you conjure up memories of the past, your choices will affect the twins’ relationship, determine the strength of their bond, and shape the course of their lives.
Experience all chapters free in June! 
 
Revisit your past, discover the truth, and shape your future
• Uncover the truth – Use the twins’ supernatural bond to relive and explore their conflicting childhood memories.
• Shape your Story – Influence the relationship between Tyler and Alyson with choices that will determine their future.
• Unlock even more secrets – Match wits with puzzles that deepen the story and open a window into the twins’ fantasy world, “The Book of Goblins.”
Experience true-to-life setting and characters
• Unique characters – Build relationships and solve mysteries through the eyes of compelling and realistic characters.
• Alaskan splendor – Explore locations set in beautiful, highly detailed small-town Alaska in stunning 4K and HDR.

Storytelling with purpose – DONTNOD Entertainment and Xbox Game Studios conducted on-the-ground research and partnered closely with cultural, mental health and gender advocates to craft a thoughtful, true-to-life experience.

productTitle: The Bard's Tale ARPG : Remastered and Resnarkled
productDescription: You are the Bard: a selfish rogue weary of pointless sub-quests and rat-infested cellars. Through magical song you summon characters to join your quest!

productTitle: The Bard's Tale IV: Director's Cut
productDescription:
Hidden in the shadows, an evil has waited patiently. Until now. Who will face the darkness if not you? A heroic adventure featuring 50+ hours of gameplay, 350 speaking parts, a Legacy Mode for returning fans, and over 100 pieces of incredible music!

Customize How You Play
Define the way you play, using sliders on numerous options such as saving (including “save anywhere”), the mini-map, waypoint markers and many more. Whether you seek a hardcore challenge, a lighter experience, or something in-between, the choice is yours.

Create the Hero You Want To Be
Play as Bard, Fighter, Practitioner, and Rogue, each featuring 60-70 skills and collectively unlocking 21 unique classes. Build an array of characters to make every playthrough a unique experience.

Craft your Party, Your Way
Start your party with a single character, recruiting or creating new heroes to bolster your ranks. Build a party that suits your play style!

An Adventure Around Every Corner
Explore towns full of quest givers, fight your way through dark and deadly dungeons, and navigate beautiful rolling hills, dense forests, ancient tombs, and icy wastes.

Outsmart Evil
Battle your enemies in dynamic, intuitive turn-based tactical combat,that rewards clever thinking. Use superior strategies, thoughtful positioning, and deadly combos to bring down your foes!

Unlock the Secrets of the Past
Unravel challenging mysteries. If your enemies don’t get you, the devious riddles and dangerous traps just might.

Elven Puzzle Weapons
The sense of discovery and mystery doesn’t stop with the environment. Gain ancient Elven weapons containing hidden powerful skills which you’ll need to uncover by carefully examining them.

Experience the events that led to The Bard’s Tale IV: Barrows Deep and The Mage’s Tale! The Bard's Tale Trilogy is a remastering of the classic 1980s series, one of the godfathers of the RPG genre. Create an adventuring party in the first volume and play it across all three, creating a heroic story all your own! 

The Bard’s Tale Trilogy contains remastered versions of all three classic games: The Bard's Tale: Tales of the Unknown, The Bard’s Tale II: The Destiny Knight, and The Bard’s Tale III: Thief of Fate! 

Rescue a city trapped by a wizard, reforge the legendary Destiny Wand, and travel across time and space to confront a Mad God! 

Enjoy a uniform playing experience across all three titles without the need for emulation or compatibility concerns. 

For the first time, play as male or female across all three games! Also includes other quality of life changes such as automapping for all three games, spell access, and updated equipment/inventory management.

Go old school with Legacy Mode, a suite of features which allows veteran players to experience the games similarly to how they first played them "back in the day".

The Bard's Tale Trilogy is a chance for old fans to be young once again and for a new generation of roleplaying and dungeon crawler fans to discover why these games matter so much all these years later. Pick up the game and start your epic adventure today!

Hustle and grift your way across America in the ‘90s as a teenage con artist on a crime-filled road trip adventure.

Play as Ali, a curious and sarcastic high schooler who ditches band camp to go on a cross-country road trip. But this isn’t a joyride! Ali is on an all-important mission to save her family video store from the nasty loan sharks trying to shut their shop down.

Swindle strangers, pickpocket people, and con commoners across a wacky America of the ‘90s. And – it should go without saying – lie to your mom about all of it. Choose who deserves to be conned and who might need a helping hand. The world is your oyster (and hey, pearls are worth a lot!).

One Con Doesn’t Fool All  
Con people your way! Wear disguises, sneak around, eavesdrop on conversations, and learn how to approach each mark. Maybe you think you can make enough cheddar just by pickpocketing. Or seek out more complex grifts that involve breaking and entering, smooth talking, and more. It’s up to you to outsmart everyone and lockpick everything that stands between you and saving your mom's video store.

A Coming-of-Age Comedy
If there’s one surefire way to discover yourself, it’s by setting out on an adventure. Luckily for you, you’ve got the aid of an expert grifter to coach you in the elusive art of charm. But a life of crime is no laughing matter! Not unless you turn on the laugh track and make it a criminally funny sitcom. Get ready to talk your way into deals, hearts, and trouble. And don’t forget to call home every once in a while to check in with your mom. Sure, you might argue with her sometimes (most of the time?), but you’re a teenager - that’s kind of your job!

The Weird and Wack 1990s the Way You Remember Them
Whether you were a ‘90s kid or not, this game is brimming with nostalgia. It offers you the perfect opportunity to relive your own awkward high school years, or if you sadly missed out on the ‘90s, finally experience all of the classic teen movies that feel so old and outdated. Plaid, payphones, VHS tapes, and malls – THE BIG CON has got all of the outrageous fads you remember (and some you want to forget) from the 1990s.

But most importantly – you can ride the Hormipillar as much as you want!

竊取傳說中的神器，重獲寫作自由
艾帝安‧奎斯過去是一名備受好評的作家，但因犯下極殘忍的罪行而被判刑，失去了寫作能力。一名罪犯老大向艾帝安‧奎斯提出了一個狡詐的提議，打算讓他恢復原先的狀態——條件是他必須從書中找到並竊取一系列的傳奇物品，深入探索神奇的書中世界，這些世界中各自存在著獨特的規矩和挑戰。若有人阻擋在你和這些神器之間，請做好準備以說服、欺騙這些人，或甚至與他們對戰。

探索不同書籍，重新編織當中的故事
每一次的任務都會將你推往一個全新世界，包括中古時代的監獄、白雪皚皚的山峰、未來感十足的太空船等。認識書中角色，透過他們來實現目標——反正他們也不是真的活人……或者他們真的是？你執行任務時不會是隻身一人，你會在路途上遇到一名有知覺的籠中侍從並將他收留在身邊，擔任你的犯罪夥伴和可靠的顧問。

穿梭虛擬和現實，解決非比尋常的謎題
遊戲中準備了獨特謎題，考驗玩家的機智並鼓勵玩家跳脫思考框架，同時在虛擬和現實之間自由穿梭，收集珍貴物品以克服阻礙。利用墨水的神秘力量，你將能操控書中的角色、加深互動並開啟全新的探索路徑。
"The Cave is a new adventure game from Monkey Island and Maniac Mansion creator Ron Gilbert, and Double Fine Productions, the award-winning studio behind Psychonauts and Brütal Legend.

productTitle: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
productDescription:
榮獲超過200項年度最佳遊戲大獎的《The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim》推出特別版，以令人驚艷的細緻畫面帶來史詩奇幻鉅作。《Skyrim》特別版內含大獲好評的遊戲、附加內容，還有重製版藝術與特效、體積光、動態景深、螢幕空間反射等全新功能。

現在家用主機也能使用Bethesda Game Studios Creations的強大功能了。新推出的任務、環境、人物、對話、裝甲、武器和更多內容，再搭配創作，為你帶來無限遊戲體驗。

經典奇幻遊戲重生
《Skyrim》讓開放世界奇幻史詩遊戲改頭換面，為一個完全虛擬的世界注入生命，讓你隨心所欲盡情探索。

在另一個世界開展新生活
只要想得到的角色都能扮演，隨心所欲展開冒險。《The Elder Scrolls》為人津津樂道的選擇自由、敘事手法與精彩冒險，都將更上一層樓。

專屬於你的遊玩風格
數百種武器、法術、能力任你選擇。全新角色系統讓你照自己的喜好遊玩，以行動定義自我。

與惡龍戰鬥
與前所未見的遠古惡龍展開激烈戰鬥。身為龍裔，你應該了解牠們的祕密，將牠們的力量化為己用。

Includes The Elder Scrolls Online base game and the Morrowind Chapter. Join over 22 million players in the award-winning online multiplayer RPG and experience an ever-expanding story in a persistent Elder Scrolls world. 
• ESO COMES TO Xbox Series X|S - Experience the award-winning RPG like never before with game-changing features/enhancements such as 60-fps performance mode, advanced lighting and shadows, improved reflections, shorter loading times and more!
• BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE – Discover Tamriel's Second Era and enjoy all the epic quests, memorable characters, and dangerous enemies you expect in an Elder Scrolls game.
• PLAY YOUR WAY – Battle, craft, steal, siege, or explore. Combine different types of weapons, armor, and abilities to create your own style of play.
• TELL YOUR OWN STORY – Experience any story in any part of the world, in whichever order you choose – alone or with friends. 
• INCLUDES THE MORROWIND CHAPTER – Journey to the iconic island of Vvardenfell and stop a meteor from crashing into Vivec City

Developed by Shinji Mikami and the talented team at Tango Gameworks, The Evil Within embodies the meaning of pure survival horror.  Highly-crafted environments, horrifying anxiety, and an intricate story are combined to create an immersive world that will bring you to the height of tension. With limited resources at your disposal, you’ll fight for survival and experience profound fear in this perfect blend of horror and action.

https://bethesda.net/en/document/privacy-policy

From mastermind Shinji Mikami, The Evil Within 2 is the latest evolution of survival horror. Detective Sebastian Castellanos has lost it all. But when given a chance to save his daughter, he must descend once more into the nightmarish world of STEM. Horrifying threats emerge from every corner as the world twists and warps around him. Will Sebastian face adversity head on with weapons and traps, or sneak through the shadows to survive.
· Story of Redemption – Return to the nightmare to win back your life and the ones you love.
· Discover Horrifying Domains – Explore as far or quickly as you dare, but prepare wisely.
· Face Disturbing Enemies – Survive the onslaught of horrifying creatures determined to rip you apart.
· Choose How to Survive – Craft traps, sneak, run and hide, or try to battle the horror with limited ammo. 
· Visceral Horror and Suspense – Enter a frightening world filled with anxiety-inducing thrills and disturbing moments.

《Gunk》的主角 Rani 是勇敢的太空搬運工雙人組之一，靠著辛勤工作勉強維持生計的他們偶然來到了一個生機勃勃的未開發星球。他們來此尋找值錢的資源，看起來這次是中了大獎……

隨著他們逐步發現這個殘破不堪的文明所潛藏的秘密，他們必須對抗有毒黏液寄生蟲的禍害，同時開始互相猜疑並越陷越深。

使用可靠的力量手套逆轉腐化，發現古老秘密，並治癒這個星球！在探索獨特星球的同時，體驗團隊不斷變化的關係。運用你的聰明才智和快速反應，克服各種挑戰。這個神秘的失落世界藏著什麼故事？

這一切有什麼意味？Rani 在這個喚起紛繁思緒的陰鬱星球上會扮演什麼角色？有時，你必須勇敢地踏出那一步。

探索神秘世界，清除黏液，並拯救這個星球。

特色：
引人入勝的探險：在星球上探索有著潮濕洞穴的茂密叢林，冒險踏入未知世界，並揭開星球的過去。
腐化和再生：消滅黏液，恢復自然環境，改變周遭世界。運用復甦的植物生命體，更深入了解陌生而奇妙的生態系統。
深度情節：遊戲情節與探險環環相扣，兩個主要角色在遊戲過程中透過無線電密切聯絡。Fiona Nova 為主要角色 Rani 精彩配音。
音樂和氛圍：《Gunk》中流淌著撫慰人心的配樂，令人產生遐想的美術風格營造出探險的氛圍。盡情放鬆，享受獨一無二的冒險旅程吧！

潛行、偷取和射擊來開創前進之路，在《The Lamplighters League》中勇闖聳動的冒險世界！環遊世界，見識各種刺激有趣的地區風貌，利用策略回合戰鬥智取敵人，如果能善用智慧，你或許可以拯救世界。

創作《Shadowrun Trilogy》和《BATTLETECH》的 Harebrained Schemes 工作室推出了設立於架空 1930 年代的全新世界，名為「放逐宮廷」(The Banished Court) 的強橫邪教正處於統治世界的權力巔峰。數千年來，唯一能阻止這個邪惡集團實現陰謀的反抗力量，是一群人稱「點燈人聯盟」(The Lamplighters League) 的英勇學者。

不幸的，精英中的精英都已不在，現在只能仰賴底層中的精英了。

招募一幫特立獨行者和無賴組成隊伍，他們各有獨特能力和令人印象深刻的性格；體驗即時潛入行動、回合制戰術型戰鬥，以及角色導向的精彩冒險與刺激陰謀劇情，追擊「放逐宮廷」到天涯海角。

巧妙結合策略和故事，酷炫有型
- 控制由活力十足的獨特角色組成的隊伍，了解成員的專屬戰術能力和在隊伍中的戰略角色。帶著他們進行任務，就能了解他們的故事以及居住的世界。每一名特立獨行者都有專屬的戰鬥方式，能讓你透過特別的招式逆轉戰鬥局勢。
- 探索各種驚險的地區並在正式開打前先調查戰場：在即時潛入遊戲模式中潛行到敵人後方，迅速並安靜地除掉落單的敵人，為你的隊伍佔好位置，取得戰鬥優勢。
- 在刺激的回合制戰鬥中，善用特工的看家本領帶來的所有優勢和小手段。為特工新增進階能力、裝備和強化，以對抗「放逐宮廷」日益增長的威脅！

趕在世界末日來臨前
- 在架空歷史的 1930 年代世界中追擊「放逐宮廷」，從造船廠和沙漠一路到都市叢林和野外叢林。管理你的全球戰略選擇，盡力阻止你的敵人推進邪惡計畫！
- 從底層精英之中招募新盟友：在全世界尋找亡命之徒與浪人，搶在「放逐宮廷」捕捉他們之前招募他們加入己方陣營！
- 每個任務都能讓你的隊伍獲得新資源並培養能力，但請注意，壓力和受傷也可能讓隊伍吃苦！

你能阻止「放逐宮廷」依他們的邪惡意志改造世界嗎？答案就在...《The Lamplighters League 世界盡頭之塔》之中！

productTitle: The Last Case of Benedict Fox
productDescription:
Descend into a limbo of decaying memories as Benedict Fox, a self-proclaimed detective bound to his demon companion. Use that bond to explore the minds of the recently deceased in search for clues as you uncover the mysteries of an old mansion where a couple was murdered and their child has gone missing.

Treat yourself to a dark intrigue full of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded crimes in a hand-crafted adventure brought to life through a fascinating Burton-esque art style.

Take on the role of one of the notorious Slaughter family, or their victims, in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre, a third-person asymmetrical horror experience based on the groundbreaking and iconic 1974 horror film.

As a victim you must use your wits and stealth to stay out of the Family's reach and find the tools you need to lead to your eventual freedom. Slaughter Family players must seek out, track down, and stop their guests from escaping. Players of The Texas Chain Saw Massacre can finally find out if they have what it takes to survive.

Experience the mad and macabre for yourself in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

The Texas Chainsaw Massacre and all related characters, places, names and other indicia are trademarks of Vortex, Inc./Kim Henkel/Tobe Hooper. © 1974. All rights reserved.

© 2021 Gun Media Holdings, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Gun Media™ and the Gun Media™ logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Gun Media Holdings, Inc. throughout the world. SUMO DIGITAL and the SUMO DIGITAL logo are registered trademarks of Sumo Group plc. Sumo Digital Ltd is part of Sumo Group plc

productTitle: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier - The Complete Season (Episodes 1-5)
productDescription:
當你只剩下家人時…你會採取什麼手段保衛？

死屍摧毀世界四年後，零星的文明在混亂中出現。但代價為何？這新疆域的人值得信任嗎？

當Javier下定決心要找到失散家人的年輕人，你將遇到經歷難以言喻的遭遇的女孩，她的名字是Clementine，你們的命運將緊緊連繫在一起，你們的每一步決擇都可能終結一切。

可使用包括所有 5 集，來自得獎工作室Telltale Games的全新系列。

productTitle: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Ep. 2, Give No Shelter
productDescription:
三部曲遊戲系列第二集，情境設定在Robert Kirkman的得獎影集的世界。

Michonne、Pete和Sam從Monroe的流動殖民地奮力逃跑。然而暫時緩和的局勢很快就破滅；Monroe的領導人無法釋懷舊惡。Michonne對她女兒的回憶不時浮現在模糊的現實中，使她的世界變得更支離破碎…到了她需要發揮所有技能以求生存的關鍵時刻。

購買此附加內容需要《The Walking Dead: Michonne - Ep. 1, In Too Deep》。

productTitle: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Ep. 3, What We Deserve
productDescription:
遊戲三部曲的第三集，場景設定在Robert Kirkman的得獎影集的世界。

Michonne承受最近與之前抉擇的負擔，試著保護無辜的一家人，但Norma和報復心強的Monroe一夥人逐漸逼近。隨著現實破滅和她遺棄的女兒縈繞心頭，你的選擇將決定誰生誰死，與救贖在淪為煉獄的世界中真正的意義。

購買此附加內容需要《The Walking Dead: Michonne - Ep. 1, In Too Deep》。

productTitle: The Walking Dead: Michonne - The Complete Season
productDescription:
The Walking Dead: Michonne - A Telltale Miniseries 以 Robert Kirkman 的暢銷漫畫中揮舞大刀的角色主角。被她的過去所困擾，並要設法面對難以想像的損失和後悔， 故事探索 Michonne 在漫畫書中第126和139集之間消失的時間。在這整個三步曲的迷你系列中，玩家將會發現是什麼將 Michonne 從 Rick、Ezekiel 和其餘她信任的團體中帶走…以及是什麼將她帶了回來。

包括涵蓋所有三集在這部來自得獎工作室Telltale Games的全新迷你系列中。

The sequel to 2012's Game of the Year continues the story of Clementine, a young girl orphaned by the undead apocalypse. Left to fend for herself, she has been forced to learn how to survive in an unforgiving world.

Experience what it’s like to play as Clementine, meet new survivors, explore new locations and make gruesome decisions in this five-part game series of choice and consequence.

productTitle: The Walking Dead: The Complete First Season
productDescription: A five-part game series set in the same universe as Robert Kirkman’s award-winning series. Play as Lee Everett, a convicted criminal, who has been given a second chance at life in a world devastated by the undead. Experience events, meet people and visit locations that foreshadow the story of Deputy Sheriff Rick Grimes. A tailored game experience – actions, choices and decisions affect how your story plays out across the entire series.

productTitle: The Walking Dead：最終季 - The Complete Season
productDescription:
克萊門汀現在是個強悍又能幹的生存者，她的旅程來到了最終章。她顛沛流離多年，飽受活人和死人的威脅，可能終於有機會在一座隱密的學校建立家園。但必須有所犧牲才能捍衛這個家。在克萊建立生活、成為領袖的同時，也必須照顧孤兒阿傑，他是克萊僅存最接近親人的人了。在這引人入勝且扣人心弦的最終季，您將定義您的人際關係、與行屍戰鬥，也將決定克萊門汀的故事會如何收場。 

包括 4 個章節 。

此遊戲仍在開發中。可能無法隨著時間變更或發售為最終產品。購買前請確認您瞭解遊戲的未完成狀態。

神秘植物彌山遍野，毒性孢子鋪天蓋地，寥寥無幾的幸存者在漂泊的巨獸「翁布」背上尋得一席之地。
扛起擔任領袖的重擔，建起我們的村落，與巨獸相依為命，在這個充滿敵意，卻無比美麗的後啟示錄世界中求得一線生機。

建設我們的村落
井然有序的村落是我們生存的基礎。在巨獸背上發展壯大我們的村落，規劃並不斷優化物資的生產鏈，盡可能高效地利用有限的生存空間。建設起足以應對一切挑戰的村落吧。

在巨獸的背上生活
在另一種生物的背上生活令我們面對著前所未有的挑戰。我們能否與巨獸和諧共存，惺惺相惜，相依為命？還是會像寄生蟲一樣，對巨獸敲骨吸髓，只考慮自己村落的福祉？捫心自問，一言為定吧。

探索發現多樣的環境
在跨越萬水千山的旅途中，我們會見識到各種各樣的生態環境，整個村落需要適應這些環境特有的威脅和機遇。謹慎地偵察，大膽地搜尋，從陌生的地域獲取稀有的資源和上古的遺產吧。

悉心研究全新科技
舊世界殘留的遺跡仍保存著早已被遺忘的知識，我們智勇雙全的村民能夠令往昔的智慧重見天日。尋找並研究這些科技吧，但切記不可濫用研究成果，鉆木取火之人，當擔心引火燒身。

在廢土之上艱難求生
路遠迢迢，山高水險。我們要與翁布共同對抗充滿毒性的孢子，殘酷無情的氣候，嗜血成性的寄生蟲，還要面對諸多逆境的考驗。 

有關遊戲最新狀況、如何提供意見回饋及回報問題的詳細資料，請參閱 www.thewanderingvillage.com。
擁有畫面精美的《人中之龍3、4、5》重製版，歌頌桐生一馬的冒險故事。重新製作的內容和新增的在地化翻譯，再加上 1080p 60 FPS 的遊戲畫面，神室町夜生活將呈現前所未有的美麗面貌。

Outerloop Games出品的《Thirsty Suitors》 - 這是一款講述文化、人際關係、家族壓力與自我表達的遊戲。

嘉拉能否應對強勢的雙親，與前任握手言好，在姐姐的婚禮前及時修補破裂的友誼？她是否已經做好準備，迎接家族裡那位可怕又愛批評的女族長納妮的到來？

透過遊戲的一系列故事，嘉拉將在電影般的回合制戰鬥中面對前任情人。

productTitle: This War of Mine: Final Cut
productDescription:
The Remastered Final Cut version for Xbox Series X|S is finally here! 
In This War Of Mine, you do not play as an elite soldier, rather as a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with a lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. During the day you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge for items that will help you stay alive.

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.
This War of Mine: Final Cut main features:
- Inspired by real-life events
- Control your survivors and manage your shelter
- Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves―anything that helps you survive
- Make decisions―an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience
- Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game
- Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme
- All updates and free expansions added along the way to create the Final Cut

每個精妙的發明背後，總會有一個不可思議的故事。來自《Fable》系列製作團隊成員的作品，《Tin Hearts》是一款沉浸式的解謎遊戲，以愛與妥協的恢弘故事為背景的遊戲。

帶領一群頑皮的錫製玩具兵，穿越充滿玩具的神奇世界，利用各種異想天開且具創造力的新玩意兒進行彈跳、射擊和滑翔，將他們送到目的地。在50多道扭曲時間的關卡中，完成士兵路線謎題，為你的玩具們構築行進的新通道，並破解越來越難解的謎題，揭曉維多利亞時代的天才發明家 Albert J. Butterworth的情感故事。

破解一連串的謎題：操控玩具大砲肅清前方道路，利用彈跳床蹦上新高度，並操縱汽球充氣機幫助士兵們抵達目的地！

揭開故事：探索橫跨數個世代與時空的深刻情感故事，巧妙地融入這充滿謎題的世界。線索無處不在，找出線索即可獲得一則令人心動的故事做為獎勵，故事由三幕優美的有聲動畫組成。

探索神奇的世界：就像玩具店裡的孩童一般，置身於奇幻且時空交錯的維多利亞時代，感受充滿懷舊的溫暖與魅力。

發揮你的想像力：解鎖操控物件的能力，操控世界上的各種物件，包括積木、鼓和玩具火車等等。在建造通往出口的通道時，將各種物體以有趣的方式連接起來，讓無畏的錫製玩具兵得以通過，並逐步揭開他們過往的秘密。

操縱時間：暫停、快轉和倒退時間，可以改變行動的結果並完成越來越複雜的謎題。

聆聽令人回味的配樂：好整以暇地解開輕鬆的謎題，同時浸淫在得獎作曲家Matthew Chastney的動人配樂中；Matthew Chastney的作品包括《JOKER》、《Chernobyl》和《Bridgerton》。

沉浸式虛擬實境：體驗此遊戲的虛擬實境版本，此版本從頭到尾專為虛擬實境平台獨家設計製作，玩家可完全沉浸在《Tin Hearts》的美麗世界中。直接控制、觸控及感受遊戲的機制，
或者移近身體觀看令人驚豔的環境與迷人的玩具。

《Fable》開發者的話：《Tin Hearts》由才華洋溢的Lionhead Studios開發團隊的前成員製作，備受讚譽的《Fable》系列即為其力作。

From Respawn Entertainment, the studio that brought you the award-winning Titanfall, comes Titanfall™ 2. 

In single player, an aspiring Pilot and a veteran Titan combine forces to uphold a mission you were never meant to carry out. Multiplayer offers brand new Titans, expanded Pilot abilities, and deeper customization to elevate the fast-paced and exciting gameplay fans expect from the series.
在這款手繪冒險遊戲中展開愉快的探索之旅，用鏡頭揭開《TOEM》魔法世界的祕密。與個性獨特有趣角色交談，拍攝精巧照片來協助他們解決難題，並沉浸令人放鬆的美景！

productTitle: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege Deluxe Edition
productDescription:
The Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege Deluxe Edition contains:
- The full game (all maps and modes).
- All 16 operators from Years 1 and Year 2.

“One of the best first-person shooters ever made. 10\10” - GameSpot

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is an elite, realistic, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution triumphs. Featuring 5v5 attack vs. defense gameplay, and intense close-quarters combat in destructible environments.

Choose from over 60 operators, each with unique gadgets and customizable weapon loadouts. Outthink your opponents by breaching walls, floors, and windows, or lie in wait with deadly traps.

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is constantly expanding: each season brings new content, in-game events, and more.

This game leverages Smart Delivery allowing access to both the Xbox One title and the Xbox Series X|S title.

productTitle: Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon® Wildlands - Standard Edition
productDescription:
免費試玩《Ghost Recon® Wildlands》！只要下載試玩版，就能跟好友一同連線，探索魅影國度 5 小時！

增强的 HDR 功能可使画面色彩更加明亮、鲜艳。*

與最多 3 位好友組隊加入《Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon® Wildlands》，在這巨大、危險且充滿互動的開放世界，享受終極軍事射擊體驗。

擊敗毒品集團
在不久的將來，玻利維亞落入了冷血販毒集團聖塔布蘭卡手中，社會上充斥著不公不義、暴力頻傳。他們的目標：建立史上最大的毒梟之國。

化身魅影
打造個性化的魅影造型、武器和裝備。享受完全自由的遊戲風格。帶領你的小隊擊倒集團，你可以單打獨鬥，或是最多與 3 位好友組隊。

探索玻利維亞
深入 Ubisoft 有史以來規模最大的動作冒險開放世界。一探野境的絕美多變景觀，駕駛超過 60 種交通工具，不論路面或越野，一次征服海陸空三大景色。

*Xbox One S 现已推出 HDR 功能，仅在支持的游戏和电视机上可用。

在 Numenera 的科幻背景中探索十亿年后的地球。发现建立在已灭绝物种尸骨之上的第九个地球、高度先进的文明并在其上留下你自己的印记。做出数千个关键的选择并直面其后果，在寻求生命意义何在这一终极问题的答案之时，邂逅死亡的化身。 
Torment: Tides of Numenera 是史上最伟大 RPG 游戏之一的同主题继承者。这款全新的游戏探索了生命、死亡和牺牲等具有深度且关乎每个人的主题，挑战玩家以智慧做出道德决定。

Be the leader of red and blue wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created.

When you grow tired of the 100+ wobblers at your disposal you can make new ones in the unit creator.

You can also send your wobblers to fight your friends or strangers in online multiplayer!

安全帶扣好，燃燒吧郵務車，送件時間到了！最多可與三名好友一起同樂，在互動沙盒世界中手忙腳亂完成任務。嘗試投遞最拚命，完全可靠快遞服務掛保證！

功能：

本機與線上多人遊玩：自己一手包辦，保護郵件安全，或者加入三五好友，考驗你們分工合作的能力。

控制得宜的彈跳混亂：無法預測的破娃娃物理融合活潑的平台遊戲。輕鬆衝刺、跳躍、俯衝和亂抓，但如果撞到東西，就會昏死過去！

精彩世界：休息一下不送件，到處探索玩樂！遊戲裡到處是玩具、車輛與機器，用來工作或玩樂都可以。

阿貓阿狗大集合：自訂你的藍領工人，捲起袖子認真幹，送件時間到！

建造車輛、飛機或船隻……或是全部混合在一起，設計出改造版的汽艇船！多種玩法任你選擇，一起來探索「太空擱淺」戰役，在拉力賽模式中學習打造（和駕駛）各種載具的基本功，或是前往其中一個沙盒式地圖打造你在現實生活中夢寐以求的氣墊船！

戰鬥

《Trailmakers》提供了各式各樣的強力武器，協助玩家用於建造破壞力最為強大的巨大載具，在戰況激烈的小型戰鬥中，與朋友一較高下。這些武器從迷你砲到火箭發射器、炸彈艙與智能槍，可說是應有盡有。正等著玩家盡情大肆破壞。
玩家完成戰鬥載具的最後修飾後，就可運用內建準星搭配調整式瞄準輔助功能，投入殘酷無情卻公平的戰鬥。

組合式打造

看似簡單的建造模式操作方法直觀且人性化，玩家可以輕鬆拼湊組塊，三兩下就準備就緒……或是你也可以深入了解這個系統的精隨與奧妙，然後打造出結構複雜的奇觀。自訂建造內容的色彩，或是購買外觀組合包襯托出自己的與眾不同，而且這樣還能贊助這款遊戲的開發作業。


單人遊戲與多人遊戲模式

自己獨樂樂，或是組成最多八人隊伍眾樂樂，《Trailmakers》的大多數地圖都可以隨時在單人遊戲和多人遊戲這兩種模式之間切換。跟好友一起建造，或是互相切磋較量——自己設定目標，然後看看誰有辦法一路衝向終點！



太空擱淺

探索異域星球並收集所需的零件，最後逃離這樣的星球。戰役模式將帶領玩家認識能夠在這款遊戲中打造的各種不同類型載具，而且還可探索豐富多樣的使用方式。

沙盒模式遊樂場

探索兩張沙盒模式地圖，到處都有跳板、U 型場地、投石機、空中運輸機甚至是更加瘋狂的障礙物。不論什麼樣的玩法都能滿足你，進行「禪」和「恣意發揮建造手藝」；或是邀請朋友一起挑戰自我，上演各種不同的特技和競速場面，證明*你*建造出來的東西是最棒、最快、最強的！

拉力賽模式／競賽

在《Trailmakers》的拉力賽模式中，了解建造和駕駛各種載具的基本功，然後力拼全球排行榜的高位，讓《Trailmakers》的廣大玩家都知道你的名號。如果你想要尋求更多的挑戰，可前往景色秀麗的「競賽島嶼」，跟其他《Trailmakers》的頂尖賽車手一較高下，證明自己的非凡實力。

社群

使用藝廊功能，分享自己設計出來的建造成果，或是欣賞其他玩家的作品！然後，請加入歡樂的 Discord 社群，隨時掌握最新消息，並尋找志同道合的玩家一起同樂、交流建造點子並挑戰自己的建造實力。

在《TUNIC》這款小狐狸踏上遠大歷險的等量動作遊戲中，探索一個充滿失落的傳奇、古老力量及兇猛怪物的國度。身困於一個崩壞的國度，且僅武裝著自己的好奇心，你將面對體積碩大的野獸、需要收集既怪異又強大的物品，並揭開失落已久的秘密。

成為傳奇
傳聞這個國度的某處埋藏著偉大的寶藏。也許就藏在這扇金色大門之後？或者深埋地底某處？有些故事提及一座高聳入雲的宮殿，及許多充滿不可思議力量的古老生物。你會發現什麼呢？

重建一本神聖典籍
在旅途之中，你將重新建構遊戲的使用手冊。一頁接著一頁，你將揭露許多地圖、提示、特殊技能及最深層的秘密。若你找到了所有的書頁，也許好事將會發生呢……

英勇點啊，小傢伙！
投入各式各樣、充滿技巧的戰鬥。躲避、格檔、迴避，並襲擊！學習如何征服無論體型大小的各種怪物——並發掘能在旅途中協助你的有用新物品。

此遊戲仍在開發中。可能無法隨著時間變更或發售為最終產品。購買前請確認您瞭解遊戲的未完成狀態。
 
1v1高爾夫對決
踏入終極1v1對決比賽，在這裡精確比速度重要，揮桿數最低者獲勝。可用專屬空拍機探勘場地，再以合併的強力衝刺機制把球打得更遠。可在輕鬆或自訂遊戲中測測你的高爾夫球技！

8名玩家的線上競速
在大賽車風格的競賽中，跟多達七位競爭對手一起比拼。強化、衝刺和滑行，搶先擊球入洞。撞強化墊可猛然超越對手、走捷徑可智取獲勝，還可利用拾取的道具阻礙他人前進。

時間的考驗
跟時鐘比快，可賺取星星，解鎖新的場地！在每個場地跟好友比較最短時間紀錄，也可在全球排行榜上爭奪席次！

強力核心與道具
依照你的遊戲風格，配備獨特的強力核心來控制遊玩方式。以更強的力道擊球、旋轉或彈跳，還能運用強大的技能對球進行鉤吊、凍結或緊貼。 

自訂
用個性化的車輛，成為群眾中最搶眼的那一個。可自訂車體、球、車輪、擾流板、護板、車漆和增壓，超過1萬億種組合任你享用！

穿越場地
運用翅膀、車輪和機智克服地形障礙，利用強化墊和強化環的特性，同時避開雜草區、沙坑和樹木！至獨特的生物群落遊歷，包括古老的阿茲特克神殿、反重力太空場地和工業廢墟！ 

有關遊戲最新狀況、如何提供意見回饋及回報問題的詳細資料，請參閱 [https://turbogolf.racing/]。
《Unpacking》是一款體驗在日常生活情境下將物品從箱中取出，並擺放至新家的禪派益智遊戲。方塊益智解謎與家居裝潢要素兼具的本作中，你受邀打造一個舒適滿意的居住空間，同時探索即將在此處展開的生活樣貌。在八次搬家過程中，你將有機會親近了解某個素未謀面的角色，以及發現一段前所未聞的故事。

Unravel introduces Yarny, a new, lovable and endearing character made from a single thread of yarn, that slowly unravels as you move.  Inspired by the unique and breath-taking environments of Northern Scandinavia, Unravel is a visually stunning, physics-based puzzle platformer. Using yarn to swing from tree branch to tree branch or hitch a ride on a flying kite, no feat is too big. Yarny is brought to life as the representation of the ties that bind loved-ones together.  Embark with Yarny on a seemingly larger than life adventure to reconnect the long-lost memories of a family. Told completely without words, experience an exciting and heartfelt story about love, hope and the journey of life.

Conditions and restrictions apply.  See http://www.ea.com/1/product-eulas for details.

Winner - D.I.C.E. Awards Family Game of the Year.

When you cut ties to the past, new bonds form. In Unravel Two, create a Yarny of your very own. Then build relationships with other Yarnys in local co-op or as a single player, fostering friendship and support as you journey together.
Begin your adventure in a cold and imposing land, then watch your surroundings blossom with new life as you chase the spark of adventure. Dive into an immersive story filled with energy, exuberance, inspiration – even monsters. Approach every challenge with positivity and fearlessness to awaken the world around you, and discover an unbreakable bond between friends.

Conditions and restrictions apply. See www.ea.com/legal for details.

此遊戲仍在開發中。可能無法隨著時間變更或發售為最終產品。購買前請確認您瞭解遊戲的未完成狀態。

《英靈神殿》是一款環境殘酷的探索生存遊戲，適合1-10名玩家暢玩，遊戲背景是一個由程式生成的煉獄，設計靈感源自北歐神話。製造強力武器，建造長屋，殺死強大的敵人，向奧丁證明你自己！


探索第十大神界
探索一個籠罩在神祕氣氛中的世界，在不同的環境中與不同的敵人戰鬥、搜集資源、揭開祕密！成為一名維京人，在無邊的大海上航行，尋找未知土地，對抗嗜血怪物。


建造大殿
修建維京長屋，打造基地，抵禦即將到來的危險。遊戲設有細節化的建築系統，建築內部與外部皆可定製。提升建築等級來升級、擴張和防禦你的基地。


搜集、製造、生存
搜集資源，製造武器、盔甲、工具、船隻和防禦工事，努力生存下去。裝飾壁爐、磨利刀刃、種植穀物和蔬菜、準備食物、釀造蜜酒和藥水、擊敗更具挑戰性的頭目、發現新的配方和藍圖，推進遊戲進程。


主要特色
- 一個由程式生成的龐大世界，裡面每一個生物群落都獨一無二，給人身臨其境之感，還有獨特的敵人、資源和製作配方等待玩家去發現。
- 可以獨自遊戲，也可以和其他玩家一起（最多10人）在專用的玩家託管伺服器上暢玩。體驗擁有無限創造可能的世界，挑戰難度不斷攀升的敵人。
- 基於耐力消耗的戰鬥，需要事先做好充分準備並善用技能。使用攻擊方式各異的不同類型武器、施展各種格擋招式並巧妙利用遠端戰鬥、閃避和招架來對抗敵人。
- 獎勵性食物系統。玩家不會感到饑餓，也不會因為沒有進食而受到懲罰，而是可以消耗食物來恢復生命值和耐力以及獲得一些再生增益效果。不同的食物具有不同的效果。
- 直觀的製作流程，配方可以在探索世界過程中以及拾取新的資源和配料時獲得。
- 靈活的建築系統，玩家需考慮結構完整性和通風情況。建造小型避難所或者整個村莊，搭建哨所，也可將廢棄建築收為己用。然後根據喜好定製。
- 揚帆起航，前往遙遠的土地，探索廣袤的海洋，尋找財富，對抗怪物。
- 史詩級頭目戰，即便是準備得最為充分的維京人也免不了一場惡戰。擊敗頭目，獲得獎勵，成為你的旅程的助力。

有關遊戲最新狀況、如何提供意見回饋及回報問題的詳細資料，請參閱 www.valheim.com。

Vampire Survivors is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. There's no place to hide, all you can do is try to survive a cursed night and get as much gold as possible for the next survivor, before Death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.

Starting Tips:

- Take your time to grab gems and items, they won't disappear.
- Get two or three offensive weapons at first, but focus on levelling them up one at a time.
- Armour and Luck are good starting power-ups to spend money on.
- Refund power-ups often, it's free, and try new upgrade paths.

《Venba》是一款敘事型料理遊戲，您將扮演一位於1980年代與家人一同移民到加拿大的印度媽媽。玩家需要製作各種料理來修復部分破損的食譜，透過分歧對話來探索這個關於家庭、愛情、失去等的故事。

料理出令人垂涎的料理
文芭她的食譜在搬家到加拿大的途中不小心弄破了。修復破損的食譜，製作上頭記載的美味料理，聯繫起過往與現今的家。

探索、交談、體驗
透過各個分歧對話深入瞭解這個家庭，並在面對日常生活中的難題時進行探索。

Take back the city of Tertium from hordes of bloodthirsty foes in this intense and brutal action shooter. Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is the new co-op focused experience from the award-winning team behind the Vermintide series.

In the depths of the hive, the seeds of corruption threaten to turn into an overwhelming tide of darkness. A mysterious and sinister new force is seeking to take control of the entire city. It is up to you and your allies in the Inquisition to root out the enemy before the city succumbs to Chaos.

As Tertium falls, Rejects Will Rise.

High Octane Hybrid Combat
Built on the legacy of Vermintide 2’s best-in-class melee combat, Warhammer 40,000: Darktide introduces intense WH40K gunplay to the mix. Master the balance between ranged and melee combat as you fight through a slew of enemies. Feel the impact of each swipe, swing, and slice of a chainsword, or fry some flesh with a lasgun.

Die Alone or Suffer Together
Darktide is a co-op game. Wandering too far, risks punishment by foes looking to immobilize or capture stray Rejects, such as the slavering Chaos Hound or the Moebian Trapper. Once you fall prey to such foes, only your teammates can save you! More than that, your innate toughness – your determination to press on through the pain – only recharges when you are in the proximity of your strike team.

Your Character. Your Playstyle. 
Create your own, unique character and customize their physical appearance, voice, and origin. Choose your class to determine which unique traits and skill sets they will make use of in battle. Will you be a seasoned veteran of the Imperial army, a snarky outsider, or a fiery zealot? The choice is yours.

Tertium - A Hive City on the Brink of Collapse
Step into the violent, dystopian world of Warhammer 40,000. From boiling hot industrial factories to the decaying water maintenance zone afflicted by constant acid rainfall - Tertium Hive is a hard and unforgiving place even at the best of times. Your role is to serve the zealous Inquisition by embarking on missions to exterminate the threats lurking in the depths of the hive city, or die trying.

Chaos Never Sleeps 
Adapt to the erratic whims of Chaos with conditions- mutators that add a spontaneous challenge to your mission. Your team must learn to adjust, adopt new tactics and change up their loadouts to face these ruthless challenges.

Fight, survive and live to tell the tales.

A century has passed since the fall of the Edoran Empire at the hands of an unprecedented plague that swept the nation. Now, the land is rife with mercenary work, banditry and thievery, with honor having become an almost entirely forgotten virtue.

Now, prepare to lead a group of unscrupulous characters in a massive open world where combat, death and a thirst for riches will dictate your day to day life. You are not the hero of this story, destined to usher in a new era of peace. Your goal is solely to survive and thrive in this harsh and hostile world, by any means necessary…

Only the bravest and most ambitious can hope to see their story written in the Wartales!


Develop your group of mercenaries.

Lead a group of mercenaries on a dangerous quest for riches and recognition in a medieval world ravaged by destitution and greed, recruiting new companions with numerous unique specializations, skill sets, weapon preferences and personalities.

Customize your group's skills, equipment, and appearance with an intuitive RPG progression and crafting system, while developing your camp with luxuries, tools, and equipment to help your team endure and recover from the hardships each day brings.


Explore a vibrant and mysterious world.

Journey through a vast, open world in your quest for notoriety, wealth, and recognition, immersing yourself in lively villages and remnants of a bygone era. Explore abandoned mines, tombs, and camps as you piece together the history of this harsh world.


Prosper and write your story.

Collect bounties and take on contracts. From protecting the innocent from petty thieves to defeating the land's most notorious figures, there's no such thing as a profit too small to take.

Overcome your foes with a tactical turn-based combat system that rewards careful planning and strategic thinking, selecting the best combination of characters, equipment, and tactics to succeed in each unique battle.


4 player cooperative.

Traverse the vast open world of Wartales as a band of up to 4 players, planning tactics and devising a strategy before confronting some of the many hostile inhabitants that roam these mysterious lands and defeating them as a team.

Share money, loot, resources, and end the day with a delicious meal around a roaring campfire with your loyal companions, building camaraderie and forging unbreakable bonds that will help you overcome any obstacle.

In Wasteland 3 the fate of Arizona depends on the fate of Colorado. You’re a Desert Ranger, fighting a losing battle to keep your beloved Arizona alive, when the self-proclaimed Patriarch of Colorado radios, promising aid if you’ll do a job he can only entrust to an outsider—rescue his land from the ambitions of his three bloodthirsty children.

Wasteland 3 is a post-apocalyptic RPG from inXile entertainment, featuring challenging tactical combat, hours of exploration, and a deep, reactive story full of twists, turns, and brutal ethical decisions. Play in single-player or co-op as you customize your squad with perks and abilities geared to your playstyle, and customize your vehicle—the Kodiak—turning it into a hardened war beast. Saving Colorado isn't going to be easy, but Arizona is counting on you, so... don't screw it up.

Originally released in 1988, Wasteland brought the post-apocalypse to video games and inspired a genre. Play one of history’s defining RPGs with completely overhauled graphics, sound, and expanded musical score.

The year is 2087, nearly a century after an all-out nuclear war turned vast swaths of the Earth into a radioactive hellscape. You are a Desert Ranger, a band of stalwart lawmen who are the only hope left in what was once the American southwest, and good people’s last defense against hunger, sickness, ravaging raiders, and mutants.

Now something more secretive and sinister is menacing humanity, and it's your job to investigate. Recruit help and follow leads—the choices you make will shape the world around you. Choose wisely, your life and the lives of those you’re sworn to protect depend on it.

扮演年轻的聪明黑客马可仕．哈洛威（Marcus Holloway），来到技术革命的起源地：旧金山湾区。
加入最恶名昭彰的黑客团体 DedSec，执行史上最大规模的黑客行动，彻底消灭犯罪首脑用来大规模监视操控市民的侵入性运作系统 ctOS 2.0。

·         探索动态开放世界，充满各种游戏操作可能。
·         骇进每一组联机装置，控制城市公共设施。
·         根据你的游戏风格培养不同技能，升级你的黑客工具：遥控车、四旋翼无人机、3D 打印武器和更多内容。
·         在全新的合作模式和对抗式多人游戏与好友无缝联机，享受全新的《看门狗》游戏体验。

Reforge a blacksmith’s world

In the faraway land of Ellian, legendary artisans have gathered for ages to perfect their craft. Now it’s your turn to join them.

Step into the boots of a journeyman blacksmith on a quest to become a master in While the Iron’s Hot, a crafty adventure assembled with mystery, wit, and charm. Forge, smelt, and combine works of metal to grow your smithing skills and discover exquisite new items to create. Explore an island filled with resources, treasures, puzzles, and fellow artisans with their own motives and designs. Rebuild the ruins of Ellian’s long-abandoned blacksmiths’ village to restore its former glory and grow your own crafting capabilities—and ultimately become a true master smith.

Forge, smelt, assemble
Master every step of the smithing process. Smelt ore and metal into ingots, and shape them into useful parts. Grind each piece to perfection, then use your creativity, knowledge, and finely honed observation skills to assemble alloyed works of art.

Smith a solution
In a land of artisans, you can forge your own key to almost any challenge. Repair machinery to open up pathways. Overcome puzzling environmental conundrums. Win over the isle’s most hardened personalities with your crafty smithing wiles.

Unearth a whimsical adventure
The land of Ellian is a bright, even a little mystical, world populated by charismatic and quirky characters. Explore tunnels with puzzles and resources, and embark on a combat-free journey to reforge the links of a world where crafting connects everything.

Discover the island’s secrets
Ellian is a land of creativity cloaked in mystery. Craft the equipment you need to venture out to new regions. Meet villages full of adept alchemists or skilled shipwrights, but take care—not everyone trusts that you have the best interests of Ellian at heart.

Rebuild a legendary smiths’ village
Forge a new home in Stal, a former haven for blacksmiths, now in ruin following a mysterious disaster. Revitalize the village to upgrade your own capabilities, and prove to the artisans of Ellian you’re worthy of becoming a master blacksmith.

妖邪亂世 龍躍在淵

Team Ninja出品暗黑三國誅死遊戲。

西曆184年，中國。時值東漢末年，硝煙四起，生靈塗炭。
昔日睥睨天下的大漢王朝，其天命如今搖搖欲墜。
在結合歷史、 奇幻與動作元素的本三國動作RPG中，
玩家將化身為無名義勇兵，運用融合了中華武術精髓的劍戟動作，
力挑各路英雄豪傑與橫行跋扈的妖魔，踏破三國亂世。

以東漢末年的中原大地為舞台，玩家將化身無名義勇兵，
運用融合了中華武術精髓的劍戟動作，踏破妖魔橫行之亂世。
此外，本作還設計了嶄新的戰略要素，幫助玩家克服逆境。

※所有下載內容皆需連接網路方可執行。
※本產品為通常版。另有包含本產品內容在內的「Digital Deluxe Edition」可供選購。

1960 年歐洲。第二次世界大戰的局勢，因為一種新款的神秘先進科技的運用而扭轉。透過持續不懈 的武力和威脅，一股殘酷無情的全球勢力讓最強大的國家都向它俯首稱臣。該政權現在以鐵腕政策 主宰世界各地。你是唯一能夠改寫歷史的人。

在《德軍總部：新秩序》裡，您將扮演超級戰士B.J. 步拉考衛姿的角色，並運用他的精英作戰戰術 和超炫的先進武器裝備來消滅世界上最強大的帝國。和一班抵抗戰士聯手發動全球攻擊，同時試圖 揭開這個政權如何迅速地征服世界的真相。

對抗那大量的機甲、超級士兵和看似不可阻擋的軍隊，並把這星球從難以想像的暴政噩夢解救出來。

Wolfenstein: The Old Blood is a standalone prequel to the critically acclaimed first-person action-adventure shooter, Wolfenstein: The New Order. The adventure, which spans eight chapters and two interconnected stories, features the hallmarks of MachineGames – thrilling action, immersive story and intense first-person combat. As war hero B.J. Blazkowicz, arm yourself with new weapons such as the bolt-action rifle and grenade-launching Kampfpistole as you attempt to thwart the advancing Nazi war machine, and take advantage of duel-wielding pipes that can be used for wall climbing – or for vicious take-downs of never-before-seen Nazi adversaries.

Try Wolfenstein: Youngblood for free. Access to all gameplay and features requires an invitation from a Buddy Pass owner.

Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Nineteen years after the events of Wolfenstein II, BJ Blazkowicz has disappeared after a mission into Nazi-occupied Paris. Now, after years of training from their battle-hardened father, BJ’s twin daughters, Jess and Soph Blazkowicz, are forced into action.

Team up with a friend or play alone. Level up, explore, and complete missions to unlock new abilities, weapons, gadgets, cosmetics, and more to complement your playstyle and customize your appearance.

Wolfenstein: Youngblood features the most open-ended Wolfenstein experience to date. From a new base of operations located deep in the heart of the Paris catacombs, plan how and when to attack and dismantle the Nazi regime.

Wolfenstein® II: The New Colossus™ is the highly anticipated sequel to the critically acclaimed, Wolfenstein®: The New Order™ developed by the award-winning studio MachineGames. An exhilarating adventure brought to life by the industry-leading id Tech® 6, Wolfenstein® II sends players to Nazi-controlled America on a mission to recruit the boldest resistance leaders left. Fight the Nazis in iconic American locations, equip an arsenal of badass guns, and unleash new abilities to blast your way through legions of Nazi soldiers in this definitive first-person shooter. 

America, 1961. The Nazis maintain their stranglehold on the world. You are BJ Blazkowicz, aka “Terror-Billy,” member of the Resistance, scourge of the Nazi empire, and humanity’s last hope for liberty. Only you have the guts, guns, and gumption to return stateside, kill every Nazi in sight, and spark the second American Revolution.

https://bethesda.net/en/document/privacy-policy

《末日之戰：劫後餘生》是一款製作精良的合作類僵屍射擊遊戲，遊戲的靈感源自於派拉蒙影業公司拍攝的熱門影片，同時也是對《末日之戰》的再度升級，原作吸引的玩家高達2000萬之多。玩家可在PC和主機端跨平台遊戲，對抗成群結隊的僵屍，拯救僵屍圍城的殘破世界。你可以邀請最多三位好友共同殺敵，或與AI隊友並肩作戰。跟隨緊張刺激的故事主軸，在羅馬、梵蒂岡和俄羅斯的堪察加半島等剛被僵屍佔領的地區內浴血奮戰，合力擊退成群的嗜血僵屍。

《末日之戰：劫後餘生》還包括《末日之戰：年度版》中的所有內容，因此擁有原作《末日之戰》或《末日之戰：年度版》的玩家可以在同一平台以折扣價購買《末日之戰：劫後餘生》。

戰火硝煙下的全新故事篇章

發生在羅馬、梵蒂岡和俄羅斯遠東堪察加半島的全新故事劇情。扮演全新角色或回歸角色，體驗新推出的兇殘近戰系統，與大群僵屍近距離搏鬥。依靠獨有的走位、技能和鐮刀、砍刀等雙持武器，消滅僵屍大軍。抵禦全新的不死怪物，包括成群結隊的食肉老鼠，可別讓你的生存小隊因此亂了陣腳！

僵屍大軍再度升級

在Xbox Series XIS平台上以4K分辨率60幀的超高畫質暢快遊玩。在Xbox Series X|S全新的Horde Mode XL遊戲模式中，迎戰強度不斷升級的無盡僵屍浪潮，消滅螢幕上數量遠超螢以往的嗜血僵屍。

深化成長機制，盡享全新視角

在《末日之戰：劫後餘生》中體驗讓人心跳加速的全新第一人稱視角。升級八個專屬職業，分別是槍手、叛逆者、劈砍者、醫療兵、修理師、殲滅者、無人機大師以及新增的尖兵，每個職業都有自己獨有的技能和遊戲玩法。自訂武器來應對任何生存挑戰，在經過特殊修改的每日任務關卡中大獲全勝，贏取豐富的額外獎勵。

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. 







• Unique Racing Experience – Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas.







• Awesome Cars – Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won’t find anything like this in other games. 







• Meaningful Customization – Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor – Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between!







• Multiplayer – Wreck your friends online and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance!







• Challenge modes – Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! 







• Career Mode – Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion!

80 年代的浮華與魅力，以及肆無忌憚的墮落，盡在《Yakuza 0》中重現。扮演主角桐生一馬，以及系列固定班底真島吾朗，在東京和大阪街頭拚死搏鬥。

一次簡單的討債任務出了差錯，對方竟然遭到謀殺。扮演桐生一馬，釐清自己深陷什麼樣的麻煩。接著，換上真島吾朗的華麗打扮，探索這位夜總會老闆的「普通」生活。

在三種不同的打鬥風格之間切換自如，打趴各方流氓、混混、小嘍囉和人渣。利用周圍的腳踏車、路標、車門等物體，組成連擊把敵人打得粉身碎骨，或是施展狠勁十足的一擊必殺，讓戰鬥境界更上一層樓。

身處 1988 年的日本，打架鬧事可不是唯一能殺時間的娛樂。從迪斯可舞廳、女公關夜總會，到經典的 SEGA 電子遊樂場，這個細節刻劃豐富的霓虹世界將帶來各式各樣的休閒活動。

以1080p 60 FPS的遊戲畫面，重新體驗桐生一馬冒險故事的第三章。

日本黑道東西全面戰爭的一年後，桐生一馬和澤村遙離開冷血無情的神室町，來到沖繩的一座小島經營牽牛花孤兒院。然而苦心未果，桐生過去的陰影緊跟而至，眼看就要將牽牛花孤兒院捲入東城會和政治界之間一場攸關生死的權力鬥爭。 

以「不夜城」東京神室町及熱帶沖繩為背景的精彩故事，就此展開。桐生是否能成功阻擋地下世界與國家威權的威脅，保護孤兒院的孩子們呢？

完成「堂島之龍」的旅程。

以1080p 60 FPS的遊戲畫面，體驗桐生一馬冒險故事的第四章。

2010年，東京。充滿人性慾望與喧鬧的紅燈區，某天晚上發生了一起槍擊事件。雖然對這個地方來說應該是「常有的事件」……但一名悲傷女子的現身，卻使一切改觀。地下社會的人們有如飛蛾撲火般，陸續找上「傳說中的黑道」桐生一馬。

四名男子的命運交錯，他們炙熱暴力的生存之道，將創造新的奇蹟。

系列首創！可操縱多名主角，呈現前所未見的故事深度與戰鬥場景。個性鮮明的三名新主角，將在故事結束前開創全新傳奇。

完成「堂島之龍」的旅程。

以1080p 60 FPS的遊戲畫面，體驗桐生一馬冒險故事的第五章。

2012年12月，桐生一馬拋下自己身為「傳說中的黑道」的過去，離開了他在沖繩的安身之地。

現在的他隱姓埋名，在福岡紅燈區的一角擔任計程車司機。一切都是為了實現重要之人的「夢想」。

然而，原本維持著良好平衡的東西黑道，關係逐漸緊繃，全日本的黑道組織大戰一觸即發。

為了保護他所愛之人的「夢想」，桐生再次被捲入戰鬥漩渦之中。

這是一段關於四名男子和一名少女在日本五大都市追夢的故事，以系列開創以來最大規模的舞台為背景呈現。

完成「堂島之龍」的旅程。

在《Yakuza 6》，桐生一馬投身調查一連串撲朔迷離的事件，這些事件涉及到他最珍視的親友，他也在過程中了解到人會為了家人，不管是因為血緣或羈絆，犧牲到何種地步。入監服刑三年剛出來的桐生不僅添了歲數，人也憔悴許多，他前往育幼院尋找養女遙，卻發現她失蹤了。他循著線索來到自己的老地盤神室町，發現遙被車子撞到，現在陷入昏迷當中。雪上加霜的是，桐生得知遙現在有個兒子，而他必須負責照顧。一手抱著嬰兒，桐生來到廣島的港都仁涯町想了解遙生下這個兒子的真相，並探查廣島黑道所掩藏的邪惡祕密。

從無比寫實的場景，美麗又慵懶閑散的廣島尾道仁涯町，到東京最大紅燈區神室町的最新變化，《Yakuza 6》融合了寫實的犯罪故事、超火爆的戰鬥，以及這些地方衍生的罪惡和提供的娛樂消遣，可說是本系列的終極之作。

進入「人龍引擎」（Dragon Engine）探索前所未有的極道世界。《Yakuza 6》是第一款專為目前世代主機，從頭打造而成的《Yakuza》遊戲，透過精緻的畫面、栩栩如生的動畫、全新物理引擎、互動式店面、一氣呵成的轉場，以及更多遊戲內容，讓玩家深刻體驗混亂不堪的日本地下世界。

探索重生的神室町和風景如畫的尾道仁涯町，令人目眩神迷的燈光、投機取巧的居民，以及讓人縱情享樂的娛樂消遣都讓神室町變得更加迷人。翻新卡拉OK、棒球打擊練習場、射飛鏢、女服務生，和SEGA街機等小遊戲，帶來更加流暢的遊戲體驗和無限樂趣。還有RIZAP健身房、貓咪咖啡廳和幫派創造者等新增項目，是徹夜幹架筋疲力竭後的絕佳休閒！但也是時候遠離喧囂的都市生活，當一個觀光客遊歷漂亮的尾道仁涯町。這個寧靜的海邊小鎮有許許多多的當地活動等你體驗，比方說你可以去泡酒吧，或是體驗魚叉捕魚（想像你在玩刺激的軌道射擊......不過射的是魚）等等。

用力把人揍趴吧。《Yakuza 6》的桐生是眾所皆知的狠角色，所以講到街頭幹架，他可是歷經千錘百鍊的老手。雖然這次他只使用一種打鬥風格，但你最好相信被桐生打中，有如被卡車撞到一樣。要命的連續技和威力驚人的熱血技能回歸，但現在堂島之龍可以注滿計量表發動「究極熱血模式」。一旦發動這個模式，桐生就會散發藍光，用他的拳頭或手邊的「工具」使出殺傷力超高的連續技。

全部日語配音。這是本系列有史以來第一次，所有台詞和對話全部採日語配音。好好享受本遊戲系列峰迴路轉的劇情故事和令人捧腹的幽默笑料，就像在觀賞一部互動式的外語片一樣。

《Yakuza》為《Yakuza Kiwami》系列的第一代重製版，將重現 SEGA 大受好評經典系列作的起點。

為了保護摯友，桐生一馬頂罪入獄，在牢裡度過了十年歲月。出獄之後，一馬卻遭自己的幫派組織除名，不得已獨自一人在今非昔比的社會中求生存。

一馬先前所屬的東城會金庫裡「消失的一百億日圓」更成了導火線，讓事態急轉直下，點燃了歡樂街神室町的戰火。一馬和名為「遙」的神秘少女相遇了，兩人必須為生存而奮戰，並在混亂的事態當中辨明真相，揭露事實。

一百億日圓事件的一年後，桐生一馬終於與澤村遙建立起平凡安穩的生活。然而，一次暗殺事件使得東城會和近江連合之間的全面戰爭一觸即發，也迫使桐生一馬回歸極道世界。「堂島之龍」桐生一馬必須前往大阪蒼天堀，與敵對幫派之間進行和平協商。不過「關西之龍」鄉田龍司，將會不顧一切使戰火持續延燒。這個世界，容不下兩條龍。

使用「人龍引擎」從零打造的《Yakuza Kiwami 2》，是本系列傑出之作的現代經典重現。盡情遊玩粉絲最愛的小遊戲，包括更新過的「風化島公關俱樂部經營模擬」和「幫派創造者」，或者試試新加入的高爾夫賓果及「小便斗」等選擇。此外，《Kiwami 2》也新增了「真島吾朗的真相」的追加劇情。玩家可實際操作真島吾朗展開冒險，揭開本作故事發生之前的一連串事件。

productTitle: You Suck at Parking® Complete Edition
productDescription:
準備好迎接火熱氣氛，享受《You Suck at Parking® Complete Edition》的歡樂體驗吧。只有在這款遊戲裡，您的停車技術遠比駕駛技術更加重要。在超過 270 個令人哭笑不得、有趣又狂野的關卡中，盡情甩尾、巡航，偶爾還能飛上高空，嘗嘗與時間賽跑的激烈競賽。

在戰役中取得進展，或挑戰多人遊戲，解鎖並獲得新的自訂選項，為您的座駕增添色彩。

展現您高超的技術，並且登上全球排行榜，向好友證明您的停車技術足以改變全世界。

要是您的朋友老是嘲笑您在現實生活中的停車技術，那就來好友組隊遊戲報仇雪恨吧，您可以主辦一場 8 人遊戲，邀請 3 位好友一同享受混亂的樂趣。

盡情歡笑，盡情流淚。但是不管怎樣您都會發現：您的停車技術真的很爛。

在這款由《狙擊之神 4》的開發者打造的讓人心驚膽寒的射擊遊戲中，希特拉的屍群再度回歸了！故事發生在 1940 年代的歐洲，有著人憎鬼厭的神秘敵人、史詩般的武器與艱鉅的 1-4 人新戰役，你要全力戰鬥，拯救人類免遭喪屍末日！
 
 抵抗軍擊敗了喪屍希特拉並將他投入地獄——但喪屍再次復活，比以往更加飢餓！以龐大的新關卡續寫 Zombie Army 三部曲的另類歷史續篇，揭露一個讓倖存者旅走遍義大利及更高地方的險惡計畫！
 
 體驗定義了這一遊戲類型的彈道學，打造適合你的殺手，並利用火焰、閃電和神聖的精華升級你的槍支。當你被喪屍包圍時，用增強的近戰格鬥與撕裂肉體的擊殺動作將它們擊潰！

* 線上多人遊戲需 Windows 10 版本 10.0.16299 以上才能進行。
「廣受歡迎的 Zoo Tycoon 系列經過全面重製，並將打造終極動物園的刺激、挑戰和樂趣提升到了一個全新的水平。讓您的想像力隨著《Zoo Tycoon: Ultimate Animal Collection》盡情奔馳！您可以從將近 200 種視覺效果驚人的動物，還有規模最大、細節最為詳盡的環境中進行挑選，然後自己建造、管理並維護您夢想中的動物園，或與最多三名玩家在 Xbox Live 上一起進行遊戲。這款動物園模擬遊戲將讓所有年齡層的動物愛好者們為之著迷。

Zoo Tycoon 不但容易上手，且玩法簡單，還可以讓您和動物們近距離接觸，與牠們進行互動。透過動物園體驗直覺操作方式和有趣的教學課程，讓所有年齡層的玩家都能享受到遊戲的樂趣。請在遊戲中盡情發揮想像力，因為動物和遊客們會對您富有創意的選擇做出反應，最終決定您是否能夠成為一名動物園大亨。」

單人遊戲, 高解析 閃亮的彩石朝著張開大口的金骷髏頭旋轉前進。利用青蛙嘴中吐出的彩石，將至少 3 顆一列的同顏色彩石瞬間清除。被金骷髏頭吞沒前，趕緊清除所有的彩石。有些彩石可以倒退滾動，有些則可以讓步調變慢，還有一些可以幫助瞄準。金幣、連線組合、隔層消除以及最快過關時間，都可以讓你得到紅利點數。在冒險模式中，有十三種難度等級。在挑戰模式中，彩石會持續出現，直到你被金骷髏頭吞沒為止。小心！此項目無退款款項。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 www.xbox.com/live/accounts。

Experience new levels of ball-blasting action!Leap in and conquer 69 levels of Adventure mode. Discover four new Spirit Animals (at least one of them is a monkey!) and harness their abilities to power up your game. Dive in to the high-stakes Iron Frog mode: 10 levels, one frog. Can you make it out alive? Battle all 8 tiki bosses in the fast-paced Boss Rush. Enter the Weekly Challenge and compete for high score on a new level every week.
